more description: *Not rentable to local Anchorage residents.* Located in Midtown Anchorage, about a 7-minute drive from the airport. In walking distance are shops, restaurants, and entertainment. This unit is equipped with 1 Queen bed, a kitchenette, a bathroom, high-speed WIFI, and a 65-inch TV (Netflix, Hulu, Disney+, ESPN+). In a single-story building with 6 other units. Make this forest-themed studio your resting spot as you explore Anchorage!Note: neighborhood is not glamorous! Security cameras outside.The spaceRecent updates and renovations. Clean and cozy! Equipped with full amenities for cooking.Coffee provided.This is a 6-unit studio building. The walls are thin and noise from other units will be heard. We ask that you please mind the quiet hours from 10PM-9AM.

description: Charming Hillside Retreat
name: Guest suite in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire guest suite hosted by Ron2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in September 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Continue your amazing Alaska adventure with a quiet hillside retreat. Mountain views and the sounds of a creek from the valley below welcome you to an open and spacious one bedroom, one bathroom In-Law apartment outside of the city with a full kitchen and private entrance. Enjoy a gem of a location with one of the best views in Anchorage while sitting outside next to the fire pit. Moose, bear, and occasional lynx sightings are a common and delightful perk of this location.The spaceThis apartment faces southeast over Rabbit Creek valley with amazing views. You will enjoy a full galley kitchen stocked with all the cooking, baking, and preparation utensils you need. The other furnishings ensure a comfortable stay. There is a storage area which allows your luggage to conveniently stay out of sight. In the living room you'll find a 40" TV with a Netflix subscription for evenings in and weather days. The bedroom has a full dresser and walk-in closet, with shelving for your personal items.  The outdoor area in front of the apartment is yours to enjoy during your stay: As a guest you'll have exclusive use of the yard, firepit, grill, and outdoor furniture seen in the pictures outside the apartment.The only shared space is the laundry room which is privately accessible by both this apartment and the main home in which we live.

name: Apartment in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Amanda5 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in March 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: This is a 2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment in a fourplex. It’s recently been remodeled and almost everything in it is new! It’s a secure building, with a code to get in the entryway and another code to enter the unit. Everything is separate except the entryway and laundry room. With two reserved parking spaces in front of the building for you.The spaceKitchen~The kitchen is fully equipped with what you need for your stay: fridge, dishwasher, stove/oven, microwave, coffee maker, electric kettle, toaster, electric grill, blender, pots, pans, utensils, dishes, etc! Also provided are some nonperishables for you to enjoy. Living Room~A comfy couch to relax on and a TV with Roku to enjoy, what more do you need? Well the entertainment center is also an electric fireplace to keep you cozy and warm. Also provided are some games and toys/books for families of little ones. Bedrooms~Bedroom 1 has a queen bed and bedroom 2 has a double bed, they both have a nightstand, extra bedding if needed, and hangers in the closet. Bedroom 1 also has a dresser.*If needed, a pack n play can be provided for those traveling with small children. *We can also provide a queen size air mattress if more sleeping space is required. Just message me!Bathroom~A couple sets of towels are provided, as well as shampoo/conditioner/body wash and a hair dryer. Laundry Room~The laundry room is shared with the tenants in the building. We provide detergent and dryer sheets. Building~ The building is made up of four units, the unit available is on the bottom floor. Three of the four units are ran as Airbnb’s. The current tenants are nice and shouldn’t bother you at all. If for any reason you have a problem, message/call me right away!

Also, the studio is close to the Anchorage coastal trail system which offers a great place to walk, run, ride and connect to other trails around town.

name: Private room in Anchorage

number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 shared bath**__**Joined in July 2015**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to Joy's Cozy Habitat! Quiet and cozy bedroom that includes two single beds, RokuTv, and free WiFi. The shared bathroom is for guest use only. Four minute drive to Jewel Lake and  just 10 minutes from the airport. Joy's habitat is within walking distance of public transportation and a plethora of stores/restaurants! Please feel free to take advantage of the shared living room and kitchen. Coffee and tea is available upon checkin. Welcome Home!The spaceJoy's Cozy Habitat is located in a quiet and safe neighborhood.  There are two guest bedrooms and a bathroom on the first floor. The bathroom is shared between the guests unless you have booked both rooms then it's all yours! For your comfort, extra blankets and pillows can be found within the bedroom closet. Clean towels and toiletries are ready for your use.  The rooms do not come loaded with cable however, you can enjoy the free Roku movies available on Roku TV. Please feel free to use your own online streaming subscriptions as free Wifi is available. The living room, laundry, and kitchen are all conveniently located on the first floor for your use. The Kitchen has refrigerator, microwave and coffee maker for your use. If you would like to cook, please reach out to me for more instructions.  Entry is keyless, you will be given a code that will be active only during your stay. This will allow you the ability to check-in and check-out leisurely. Check in is 5pm or after and check out is 11am. Please do not book if these times do not work for you. I work a lot and I might not be home much but please do not hesitate to contact me and let me know if you need anything. I will do my best to make your stay as comfortable as possible.Please clean up behind yourself when using all shared areas. Please remove shoes at the door as there is no shoes in the house. Please remain on the first floor as the upstairs area is off limits.Welcome Home!

more description: Welcome to your home away from home!Come in to our first floor suite and take a load off from your day's adventures. Don't forget to draw the curtains back and take in the views. Not only is this space breathtaking, but its location is unbeatable!You are only:3 mins to Joint Base Elmendorf-Richardson Muldoon Gate7 mins to Moose Run Golf Course10 mins to Far North Bicentennial Park13 mins to Providence Medical Center15 mins to Arctic Valley Ski Resort1 hr to Alyeska Ski ResortThe spaceWe take the sanitation and cleaning procedures of our home very seriously. All linens are laundered with every new stay, and all commonly-touched surfaces and objects are sanitized with every cleaning.This 2 bed/1 bath condo features 1 queen and 1 twin bed in each room to comfortably sleep up to 6 guests. We also provide a pack 'n play for anyone traveling with small kiddos.  :)Working from home? We've got you covered with the FASTEST WIFI that GCI has to offer! Cozy up with dinner and a movie from your favorite streaming service via Roku TV (Disney+, Hulu, and ESPN+ Included!). Take in breathtaking views as you lounge around the propane fire table on our enormous, partially-covered patio. Sure, amazing food is just around the corner (check my Guidebook!). But sometimes, we all need a nice home-cooked meal, right? That's why our kitchen is fully stocked with all the essential cookware you'll need to create a beautiful family dinner.We hope you'll enjoy the provided amenities and the subtle speakeasy-inspired design features of our beloved "Melody BnB".

description: Hayes Street Haven.
name: Apartment in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Nathan5 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in January 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: A newly decorated apartment with a fully equipped kitchen and its own washer and dryer. Nestled in amongst tall spruce trees you are surrounded by greenery and can relax in the light, airy space of the living room with its large windows to the garden. The apartment has two bedrooms each with a queen size bed so I can very comfortably accommodate 4 people. Near the airport, 10 minutes from Downtown, parking for 4 cars.The spaceThe apartment has two bedrooms each with a queen size bed. Each of the beds has 2 sets of pillows - 2 memory foam and two feathers. Guests can mix and match depending on their preferences. Both of the bedrooms have black-out blinds in them, essential for a good nights sleep in Alaska in the summertime!The fold up bed is similar to a full size bed and will easily sleep two children or one adult. Two adults could share it if they know each other well!The kitchen has a fridge/freezer, microwave, electric range, dishwasher, rice cooker, crockpot (large and small), wok, coffee maker and toaster. I also stock the kitchen with a few basic herbs and spices and coffee and tea is provided.I have various items for babies and small children, such as a pack 'n' play with bedding, a sound machine, a high chair, 3 strollers and a dining seat booster.There is a games station with board games and puzzles for a selection of ages.All my cleaning products are from the natural ranges, as are the soaps and hair products which are provided.Although we do not currently offer TV we have unlimited WiFi access.

more description: Rustic meets comfy retreat. Treat yourself to a simple stay in Anchorage by booking this quaint efficiency studio! Sitting just minutes from the airport  & 2 m from dntn, this vacation rental offers an unbeatable location and price for your AK vacay. Spend days exploring the Last Frontier, then return home to unwind. Equipped with 3/4 bath, kitchenette, & modern living space, this studio has all the basics for a stress-free getaway! No cable. Large TV for streaming & couple of DVD's on site.The spaceTHE PROPERTYNo Frills / Parking | Kitchenette | Ground-Level Unit | No pets | WIFI/ No CableWith close proximity to the airport, downtown, and the UA Anchorage campus, this efficiency studio is the perfect landing pad for solo travelers, business trips, college visitors, or couples getaways!Studio: King BedKITCHENETTE: Well-equipped w/ mini-fridge, 2-burner stovetop, microwave, tea kettle, coffee maker, toaster, dishware & cookwareLIVING SPACE: Modern decor, dresser, closet, 2 night stands, dining table, reading chair w/ ottoman, TV with DVD player.GENERAL: Complimentary toiletries, ceiling fan, first aid kit, fire extinguishers, private entrance, step-free accessPARKING: Designated parking spaces in front of the unit (In front of unit and parking is on far right of driveway)*NOTE: This studio is a renovated garage unit. The main house on-site is also a vacation rental, and other travelers may be present on the property during your stay.THE LOCATIONDOWNTOWN SITES: Captain Cook Monument (2.6 miles), Dena'ina Civic and Convention Center (2.7 miles), Town Square Park (2.9 miles), Anchorage 5th Avenue Mall (3.0 miles), Flattop Mountain Shuttle (3.2 miles)THINGS TO DO: Alaska Aviation Museum (3.3 miles), University of Alaska Ancourage (4.2 miles), Alaska Botanical Gardens (5.5 miles), Alaska Zoo (8.5 miles), Alaska Native Heritage Center (9.5 miles)GREAT OUTDOORS: Earthquake Park (2.7 miles), Point Woronzof Park (4.4 miles), Kincaid Park (6.3 miles), Far North Bicentennial Park (7.2 miles), Chugach State Park ( miles)AIRPORT: Ted Stevens Anchorage International Airport (2.8 miles)HOUSE RULES- No smoking (smoking allowed outside)- No events, parties or large gatherings- Must be at least 25 years old to book- Additional fees and taxes may apply- Photo ID may be required upon check-in- Please do not permanently dye your hair on white towels or sheets or otherwise permanently stain any of the linens. - NOTE: This studio is a renovated garage unit. The main house on-site is also a vacation rental, and other travelers may be present during your stayADDITIONAL DETAILSPLEASE NOTE: COVID-19 government imposed travel restrictions may impact your travel plans. Please be sure to check and follow government guidelines for travel in this area.

more description: Great value! Perfect for long term stays.  Centrally located in northeast Anchorage, minutes away from Elmendorf AFB, Museum of Science and Nature, UAA, Costco, Walmart, Bass Pro Shop, shopping centers, and hospitals. Private room with one full size bed, private closet, 2 shared bathrooms, kitchen, living room, washer & dryer, high speed internet, Shared package delivery box with code, filtered alkaline drinking water. Includes Netflix, Hulu, Starz, Amazon Prime, HBO Max, Disney+, & Paramount+.The spaceBeautiful 2 story home with 5 rooms and 2 bathrooms. House was built in 1969 but don't let the age of the house fool you. Newer energy Efficient Windows through out the home. New kitchen with cherry cabinets and vinyl countertops. New Stainless Appliances in the past 3 years. New interior paint to include ceilings. New lights through out the home. Newer laminate flooring through 1st level, carpet on 2nd level. One bedroom and bath are on the main level. Top floor has 4 more bedrooms with another bath. Large laundry room with tons of shelving and storage plus a pantry off the kitchen. Quality blinds on all windows plus brand new black out curtains and curtain rods just installed.  Large dining room and living room with 60 inch TV. Kitchen is stocked with all essentials. Access to pantry, washer, dryer, fridge, etc.

more description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space just minutes from everything!5 minutes from the airport2 minutes to Costco2 minutes to the Dimond Mall5 minutes to Fred Meyer2 blocks from biking, walking and ski trails15 minutes from Hilltop Ski Area10 minutes from Downtown Anchorage5 minutes from Midtown AnchorageThe spaceThis home is perfect for business travelers, couples' getaways, small groups, or families who enjoy a peaceful setting.  You will love how it feels like a true home away from home!Every furnishing and detail was selected for our guest's comfort. From the soft sheets to the memory foam mattresses, to the fluffy towels.Enjoy the cozy living room and the functional kitchen stocked with everything you'll need for baking and cooking. The large smart TV, sound bar, and electric fireplace create the perfect space for a movie night.During the warmer months, enjoy the back deck and the large fenced back yard. When you're ready to explore, shop, or have a great meal out, the options within a few minutes are endless. Additional options are only 5-10 minutes away.Sleep well after sightseeing when you return to sleep on the ultra-comfortable new mattresses, comfortable new bedding, and blackout blinds for those long Alaskan days! We also have a pack-n-play crib, a high chair, and toddler dishes for the little ones.We have another vacation rental home within 1 mile of this home, so if you are traveling with a large group we would be happy to try to accommodate you!

description: Skyline 205: Alaska Aviation 1-Bedroom Suite
name: Loft in Downtown Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire loft hosted by Edward3 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 3 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in January 2020**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at Skyline Alaska, located in a quiet area of downtown Anchorage with private parking. This modern studio has polished concrete floors, high ceilings and tall doors, which create a spacious feel. We are walking distance to restaurants, pubs, cafes and galleries, one block from the Anchorage Railroad Depot, and 2 blocks from the Anchorage Coastal Trail.The spaceThere's a keypad entry into the building lobby and another for your room. You will receive codes the day of your arrival.
This 1 bedroom/1 bath suite is the perfect space for two but can sleep one extra guest on a queen air mattress or twin rollaway (request before arrival). Welcomed by a tall maple entrance door, you first enter the contemporary design which features large windows, high ceilings, polished concrete floors and a maple pocket door separating the bedroom. The chic black and white kitchen is furnished with a gas stove/oven, microwave, dishwasher and refrigerator/freezer; as well as dishes, glasses, flatware, pots/pans, spices and cooking oil. Everything you need to cook basic meals. The main area features comfortable seating, Roku TV and a dining table that seats four. The bedroom has a large bed, a closet for your clothes, and carpet that adds warmth to the space (and your toes). The bathroom features marble floors and black and white tiled walls. Pamper yourself with a full-sized shower, very soft towels and Dr. Teal toiletries. Then slip into dreamland in your very comfy queen-sized bed.

description: Hayes Street Haven.
name: Apartment in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Nathan5 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in January 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: A newly decorated apartment with a fully equipped kitchen and its own washer and dryer. Nestled in amongst tall spruce trees you are surrounded by greenery and can relax in the light, airy space of the living room with its large windows to the garden. The apartment has two bedrooms each with a queen size bed so I can very comfortably accommodate 4 people. Near the airport, 10 minutes from Downtown, parking for 4 cars.The spaceThe apartment has two bedrooms each with a queen size bed. Each of the beds has 2 sets of pillows - 2 memory foam and two feathers. Guests can mix and match depending on their preferences. Both of the bedrooms have black-out blinds in them, essential for a good nights sleep in Alaska in the summertime!The fold up bed is similar to a full size bed and will easily sleep two children or one adult. Two adults could share it if they know each other well!The kitchen has a fridge/freezer, microwave, electric range, dishwasher, rice cooker, crockpot (large and small), wok, coffee maker and toaster. I also stock the kitchen with a few basic herbs and spices and coffee and tea is provided.I have various items for babies and small children, such as a pack 'n' play with bedding, a sound machine, a high chair, 3 strollers and a dining seat booster.There is a games station with board games and puzzles for a selection of ages.All my cleaning products are from the natural ranges, as are the soaps and hair products which are provided.Although we do not currently offer TV we have unlimited WiFi access.

more description: Newly renovated 2 bedroom apartment right in urban downtown Anchorage! Enjoy all the comforts of home in a stylish apartment only 1 block from the Anchorage Museum. Walking distance to all the restaurants, venues, parks and events downtown Anchorage has to offer.The spaceThis downtown gem is part of a 10 plex apartment building. The apartment has just been newly updated and is ready to host guests with all the comforts of home while you are on your Anchorage adventure! All linens and fully stocked kitchen is provided. You will be extremely comfortable in this space!

more description: Second floor studio apartment with walkin closet and full length balcony. Make breakfast and enjoy it at your high table or drive to the local resturant a short drive down Old Seward Highway.Coin operated laundry. Alaska adventure - three right turns and you are on the highway to Girdwood and Alyeska Ski Resort. Keep driving south and find great Salmon fishing on world renown Kenai River. Take two rights and one left to follow the Seward Highway to the Parks Highway to Denali National Park.The spaceGreat location to quickly jump on the Seward Highway South to access Dimond Center with over 150 stores, including Dave & Busters, Best Buy, food court, ice skating, bowling and a 9 screen Regal Cinemas. Or go North on the Seward Highway and turn left at 36th to try excellent pizza and beer at Moose's Tooth. Call ahead to check on inside seating or only take-out services.

more description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at Skyline Alaska, located in a quiet area of downtown Anchorage with private parking. This modern studio has polished concrete floors, high ceilings and tall doors, which create a spacious feel. We are walking distance to restaurants, pubs, cafes and galleries, one block from the Anchorage Railroad Depot, and 2 blocks from the Anchorage Coastal Trail.The spaceThere's a keypad entry into the building lobby and another for your room. You will receive codes the day of your arrival.
Wood floors with high ceilings and tall doors give this studio a spacious and modern feel. The kitchen is equipped with a gas stove/oven, microwave, dishwasher and refrigerator/freezer; as well as dishes, glasses, flatware, pots/pans, spices and cooking oil. The main area features comfortable seating, Roku TV and a counter-height table for dining. Pamper yourself with a full-sized shower, very soft towels and Dr. Teal toiletries. Then slip into dreamland in your very comfy queen-sized bed.

more description:
The spaceChugach Mountain View HomeScenic and serene, this all-new Anchorage home is ready to welcome you to an unforgettable Alaska getaway. Boasting views of Chugaach Mountain and a convenient close to Kincaid Park and the airport, the home comes fully furnished for family comfort. A single-level floor plans allows easy access for all, while a suite of new decor and appliances come equipped for modern living. The private deck makes a picture-perfect perch for morning coffee and the bright, open living area sets the stage for cozy downtime and home entertainment with leather seating, a smart TV, and fireplace. Home meal planning is made easy in the sparkling stainless steel kitchen complete with all major appliances and thoughtful additions including a dedicated beverage fridge and dishwasher. Free WiFi and a private washer/dryer round out the home essentials.

THINGS TO KNOW
Streaming services available with guests’ own account(s). No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.Parking notes: There is free parking for 2 vehicles. more description: In the heart of midtown (Anchorage, AK). Just a 15 min walk to downtown and a short walk to Bear Tooth, Spenard Roadhouse, Middle Way Café, Kaladi Brothers Coffee, Grocery Stores, Walgreen's and Market Juice.  Washer/dryer free onsite. Everything you need to have an enjoyable stay is provided for you.The spaceLocated in the heart of Spenard this property is conveniently close to downtown (15 minute walk) and midtown (5 minute walk). Free Wi-Fi and a beautiful fenced yard. You will be staying within a block or two of Bear Tooth, Spenard Roadhouse, Mama O's, Chilkoot Charlies, Market Juice, Walgreen's Grocery and Deli, Korean Mart, and Middle Way Café. Only a few blocks away is Carrs Grocery Store, Walgreen's and Title Wave Bookstore. Local Spenard Farmers Market located directly across the street from the property (Saturday's only May - September).  In addition, Food Truck Carnival happens every Thursday for lunch across the street (May - September from 11:00 AM to 2:00 PM).

more description: This is a 2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment in a fourplex. It’s recently been remodeled and almost everything in it is new! It’s a secure building, with a code to get in the entryway and another code to enter the unit. Everything is separate except the entryway and laundry room. With two reserved parking spaces in front of the building for you.The spaceKitchen~The kitchen is fully equipped with what you need for your stay: fridge, dishwasher, stove/oven, microwave, coffee maker, electric kettle, toaster, electric grill, blender, pots, pans, utensils, dishes, etc! Also provided are some nonperishables for you to enjoy. Living Room~Comfy couches to relax on and an Amazon Fire TV, what more do you need? Also provided are some games and toys/books for families of little ones. Bedrooms~Bedroom 1 has a queen bed and bedroom 2 has a double bed, they both have a dresser, nightstand(s), extra bedding if needed, and hangers in the closet. *If needed, a pack n play can be provided for those traveling with small children. *We can also provide a queen size air mattress if more sleeping space is required. Just message me!Bathroom~A couple sets of towels are provided, as well as shampoo/conditioner/body wash and a hair dryer. Laundry Room~The laundry room is shared with the tenants in the building. We provide detergent and dryer sheets. Building~ The building is made up of four units, the unit available is on the bottom floor. Three out of the four units are ran as Airbnb’s. The current tenants are nice and shouldn’t bother you at all. If for any reason you have a problem, message/call me right away!

description: The Zurich Nook
name: Apartment in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by David4 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in September 2015**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Luxury meets simplicity. The Zurich Nook is your perfect retreat for an Alaskan adventure. Our unit is set up to provide a cozy and peaceful experience so you can focus on everything Alaska has to offer. We believe everyone needs an Alaskan trip at a value that’s accessible to all families and solo travelers alike with a luxurious touch. We provide a retreat to rest after experiencing the breweries, ocean walks, mountain hikes, and single track bike rides that Anchorage has to offer. Cheers!The spaceThis space is located within a secluded 4-plex. We have 3 quiet and respectful tenants who call Zurich their home. Up the stairs is Zurich Number Four.There are 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom. The master bedroom has a queen memory foam bed and custom closet. The second bedroom has a full bed and working desk.The bathroom has a deep tub to soak in after all the adventures. Bath amenities are provided. The kitchen is full stocked for your cooking needs with a gas range, bar space, coffee, and deep sink.The living area is spacious and cozy. Curl up and read some books from our mini library. There is a covered sitting area on the deck ready for early morning coffee.

description: 😎Perfectly located Alaska base in residential area
name: Home in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by Jennifer6 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in December 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: You will be staying in the private top level of an amazing home in the center of town in beautiful, quiet residential area.  The downstairs is also an Airbnb and is completely separate with a private entrance around the back of the home.  Centrally located, it is easy walking distance to lakes, trails, universities, and hospitals!  10 minutes to downtown!  Please ask if you need a rental car, I rent cars and SUV’s through Turo and can provide you with one at an additional fee.The space🖤 1000 square feet in remodeled home.   Private front door entrance.🖤 Plenty of parking in the driveway and in the street. 🖤 5-star hospitality!🖤 Extremely safe neighborhood🖤 10 minutes to downtown and airport.  5 minutes to universities and hospitals🖤 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom in highly coveted College Village in midtown. 🖤 Perfect for families, professionals working remotely, pet owners (fully fenced)🖤 Plenty of parking - 2 cars in the driveway or an RV in the street. 🖤 Fun, comfortable couch and big screen Smart TV in living room🖤 Free fast wifi🖤 High-end stainless steel appliances🖤 Fully stocked and equipped kitchen🖤 Fenced back yard and new deck with Propane grill, lounging chairs🖤 3 block walk to secret Otis Lake. In winter you can ski, ice skate, or snowshoe, and in summer you can canoe, paddleboard, or kayak and have the lake to yourself. The lake is stocked by Fish and Game and my son caught a 12" rainbow with his Danny Dinosaur fishing pole there.

more description: Peaceful and quiet location with ocean and mountain views from your back door. Close to Anchorage's best trails at Kincaid Park and minutes from the airport with convenient routes to downtown Anchorage. Shopping and dining are only minutes away including all of Anchorage's best Breweries! You will love this place for the privacy, comfortable bed, and convenience of a washer and dryer. Our place is perfect for couples, solo adventurers, or business travelers. This is a home away from home!The spaceThe apartment is attached to our home on a private quarter-acre lot. You will have dedicated parking, high-speed wifi, smart TV, all the essentials (i.e. linens, pillows, toilet paper, and paper towels, cleaning supplies, coffee, and tea, and so much more!). There is a full kitchen for making your meals and absolutely beautiful views right out your front window.

description: Skyline 203: Alaska Wildlife 1-Bedroom Suite
name: Loft in Downtown Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire loft hosted by Edward4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in January 2020**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at Skyline Alaska, located in a quiet area of downtown Anchorage with private parking. This modern studio has polished concrete floors, high ceilings and tall doors, which create a spacious feel. We are walking distance to restaurants, pubs, cafes and galleries, one block from the Anchorage Railroad Depot, and 2 blocks from the Anchorage Coastal Trail.The spaceThere's a keypad entry into the building lobby and another for your room. You will receive codes the day of your arrival.
This 1 bedroom/1 bath suite is a perfect space for two but can sleep up to one extra guest on the full-size sleeper sofa. Welcomed by a tall maple entrance door, you first enter the contemporary design which features large windows, high ceilings, polished concrete floors and a maple pocket door separating the bedroom. The chic black and white kitchen is furnished with a gas stove/oven, microwave, dishwasher and refrigerator/freezer; as well as dishes, glasses, flatware, pots/pans, spices and cooking oil. Everything you need to cook basic meals. The main area features comfortable seating, Roku TV and a dining table that seats four. The bedroom has a large bed, a closet for your clothes, and carpet that adds warmth to the space (and your toes). The bathroom features marble floors and black and white tiled walls. Pamper yourself in the walk-in shower (with a bench), very soft towels and Dr. Teal toiletries. Then slip into dreamland in your very comfy queen-sized bed.

description: Private Mountain Chalet with Breathtaking Views
name: Chalet in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire chalet hosted by Windy4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in August 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: ENJOY spectacular VIEWS of the city skyline, ocean, & mountains. Keep COZY around the fireplace. World class hiking/skiing trails are in walking distance. This is a luxurious Alaskan mountain getaway. We are 20 minutes from the Airport & 10 minutes from shopping & local amenities. The suite is spacious for 2, but accommodates 4 with a futon. We don’t provide TV to promote a unique experience devoid of everyday distractions. Come unplug and be REFRESHED!  Please see our RULES, they are ENFORCED.The space***HOUSE RULES*** In order to make your experience with us as pleasant as possible we have some House Rules ~* Guests MUST be 25 years or older (Unless you are a family with children). * ONLY RESERVED guests are allowed with a maximum of 4. Undeclared guests are NOT allowed. * NO VISITORS outside of reserved guests.  * You are provided ONE parking space for ONE vehicle. The space is located in front of the garage door furthest to the right. * 4-Wheel or All-Wheel Drive vehicles, with Winter Tires are NECESSARY for Winter access. We are located in the mountains and have a steep driveway. (September - April). * NO SMOKING in unit, or on property. No EXCEPTIONS!  * NO EVENTS or PARTIES. * NO PETS. * NO shoes past the entryway. * NO drones.* Quiet hours are 10pm to 10am. Please be mindful of our neighbors. * WASH and PUT AWAY all dishes that you use. * Please be respectful of our property. Any damage above normal wear and tear to the premise will be the responsibility of the guest to repair, replace, or reimburse.Upon confirming your reservation, you are agreeing to ABIDE by  ALL of these rules. Thank you so much for being an exceptional guest!***PACKAGES***  In order to make your experience as effortless and incredible as possible, we provide a Romance Package upon request.  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ***Romance Package*** ~ $50 ~ No need to hide all the goodies or pre-setup for your loved one! This package includes~ * Chilled sparkling cider * Chocolates  * Bouquet of flowers * Red rose petals thoughtfully scattered * Flickering candles throughout the suite (These are battery-powered and pre-lit for you.) * Prewritten card (If desired. just let us know what to write.) * Late check-out of 1PM ($20 value!)

more description: In the heart of midtown (Anchorage, AK). Just a 15 min walk to downtown and a short walk to Bear Tooth, Spenard Roadhouse, Middle Way Café, Kaladi Brothers Coffee, Grocery Stores, Walgreen's and Market Juice.  Washer/dryer free onsite. Everything you need to have an enjoyable stay is provided for you.The spaceLocated in the heart of Spenard this property is conveniently close to downtown (15 minute walk) and midtown (5 minute walk). Free Wi-Fi and a beautiful fenced yard. You will be staying within a block or two of Bear Tooth, Spenard Roadhouse, Mama O's, Chilkoot Charlies, Market Juice, Walgreen's Grocery and Deli, Korean Mart, and Middle Way Café. Only a few blocks away is Carrs Grocery Store, Walgreen's and Title Wave Bookstore. Local Spenard Farmers Market located directly across the street from the property (Saturday's only May - September).  In addition, Food Truck Carnival happens every Thursday for lunch across the street (May - September from 11:00 AM to 2:00 PM).

more description: Our Anchorage top and bottom duplex is conveniently located in a highly desirable neighborhood nestled between Turnagain and Spenard.   This basement mother-in-law unit has a living room, kitchen,  separate bedroom, bathroom, and laundry facilities.   This home is 3.5 miles from the airport and is centrally located for any adventures you may have planned. The Coastal trail, grocery store, and several dining options are within walking distance.The spaceOur one bedroom unit is spacious, light, and private. The cozy living room is furnished with a queen sized pull-out couch.  The bedroom has a comfy bamboo mattress and an ensuite bathroom. The kitchen is has the basics needed to cook a meal to enjoy a night in. Need to do laundry before flying or driving home,  we've got that covered as well!

more description: Welcome to the Cozy Bear in Anchorage – Just added to AirBnB in Fall 2022!We welcome you to our peaceful Lower Hillside neighborhood in Southeast Anchorage near Abbott Community Park & Far North Bicentennial Park.  The Cozy Bear is centrally located 15 minutes from the airport with easy highway access for epic adventures and sightseeing!Your hosts are a husband-and-wife team living the dream in Alaska! We’re on hand to support our guests as little or as much as they wish.The spaceYou’ll have your own private entrance and suite, a cozy living room space, plush queen bed, plus your own private bathroom & shower. The couch can also become a queen bed for two additional guests.You’ll have your own 55” television, microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, hot water kettle, coffee and teas, bistro table, and access to our backyard with a fire-pit and chairs to enjoy. We are also available to give you tips on touring the area and the local trails!  There are towels, a hair dryer, iron and ironing board, pack and play crib, soap and shampoo, and free wifi available.We occupy the upstairs and are very quiet. But we might make a little noise. If we are too loud, please tell us right away! We want you to have a peaceful retreat - ask, and you shall receive.

more description: Come and enjoy this bright and cozy 1/2 of a duplex right on Little Campbell Creek. description: Skyline 204: Mount Susitna 1-Bedroom Suite
name: Loft in Downtown Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire loft hosted by Edward4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in January 2020**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
TEnjoy a stylish experience at Skyline Alaska, located in a quiet area of downtown Anchorage with private parking. This modern studio has polished concrete floors, high ceilings and tall doors, which create a spacious feel. We are walking distance to restaurants, pubs, cafes and galleries, one block from the Anchorage Railroad Depot, and 2 blocks from the Anchorage Coastal Trail.The spaceThere's a keypad entry into the building lobby and another for your room. You will receive codes the day of your arrival.
This 1 bedroom/1 bath unit is the perfect space for two but can sleep one extra guest on the queen-size sleeper sofa. Welcomed by a tall maple entrance door, you first enter the contemporary design which features large windows, high ceilings, Portuguese cork floors and a maple pocket door separating the bedroom. The chic black and white kitchen is furnished with a gas stove/oven, microwave, dishwasher and refrigerator/freezer; as well as dishes, glasses, flatware, pots/pans, spices and cooking oil. Everything you need to cook basic meals. The main area features comfortable seating, Roku TV and a dining table that seats four. The bedroom has a large bed, a closet for your clothes, and carpet that adds warmth to the space (and your toes). The bathroom features marble floors and black and white tiled walls. Pamper yourself in the walk-in shower (with a bench), very soft towels and Dr. Teal toiletries. Then slip into dreamland in your very comfy queen-sized bed.

more description: Whether your trip is for work, to enjoy Anchorage or to get out and explore this beautiful state, we welcome you. Our little MIL is clean, serene, with a Cali/Scandi feel, making it the perfect casual setting to recharge. We offer a full kitchen, a full bath/shower, with a separate entrance to to our above garage granny flat.The spaceRecently remodeled with Airbnb guests in mind, the space is an above garage MIL apartment, light and welcoming, hypo-allergenic, with one bedroom, one bath, a full sized galley kitchen, dining space for four, with comfortable seating for relaxation. There is a 60" smart TV, lightning fast WIFI, smart locks/thermostats. In addition to a queen sized bed with a walk in closet to store your clothes and travel gear in the bedroom. Also, there are black-out shades throughout the apartment for sleep management during the midnight-sun months.

more description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place, minutes from the airport. Unique main floor living space, front door opens to fenced area with fire pit, gas grill, porch swing, perfect to hang out. Beautifully remodeled, everything is new! fastest wifi available, 58" smart TV complete with Youtube, Netflix, HULU apps & more. Washer and Dryer in unitThe spaceGuests will have access to the fully fenced yard, along with a firepit, grill and seating area outside. This unit has a separate entry, is on the main level with a ramp so if you can't do stairs, that is okay.  A cute cottage style unit with a fully stocked kitchen, a full bathroom, laundry room and a sofa bed that sleeps 2 kids comfortably.

description: Secluded duplex with amazing views - walk to backcountry skiing & hiking
name: Home in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by Vacasa Alaska6 guests ·  · 3 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in May 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
The space2 Glacier ViewDiscover the splendors of 'The Last Frontier' at this delightful three-bedroom duplex. The perfect escape from life's hustle-and-bustle, this secluded retreat comes equipped with all the essentials of home, with year-round beauty and adventure waiting at your doorstep. Boasting incredible views and abundant wildlife-sighting opportunities, the home is within walking distance to backcountry skiing and tons of great hiking trails. Girdwood and Alyeska Reesort are both a short drive away.

Furnished for family-friendly comfort, the open and inviting interior comes complete with everything you need for carefree vacation living. After the day's adventures, unwind in the living room while streaming shows and movies on the smart TV. A trio of large panel windows offer strong natural lighting and sweeping outdoor views. The mighty kitchenette pairs well with the gas grill and smoker out on the lower deck for handling at-home meals with ease. Baseboard heating and free WiFi round out the in-home essentials. A shared, on-site washer/dryer provide added convenience.

THINGS TO KNOW2 dog(s)  are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 3.Parking notes: There is free parking for 2 vehicles. Parking in drivewayDamage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.City/town tax number:681

description: Skyline 207: Anchorage Retro 1-Bedroom Suite
name: Loft in Downtown Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire loft hosted by Edward4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in January 2020**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at Skyline Alaska, located in a quiet area of downtown Anchorage with private parking. This modern studio has polished concrete floors, high ceilings and tall doors, which create a spacious feel. We are walking distance to restaurants, pubs, cafes and galleries, one block from the Anchorage Railroad Depot, and 2 blocks from the Anchorage Coastal Trail.The spaceThere's a keypad entry into the building lobby and another for your room. You will receive codes the day of your arrival.
This 1 bedroom/1 bath suite is the perfect space for two but can sleep one extra guest on a queen air mattress or twin rollaway (request before arrival). Welcomed by a tall maple entrance door, you first enter the contemporary design which features large windows, high ceilings, polished concrete floors and a maple pocket door separating the bedroom. The chic black and white kitchen is furnished with a gas stove/oven, microwave, dishwasher and refrigerator/freezer; as well as dishes, glasses, flatware, pots/pans, spices and cooking oil. Everything you need to cook basic meals. The main area features comfortable seating, Roku TV, a dining table that seats four, and a desk with a gorgeous view of the Chugach Mountains. The bedroom has a large bed, a closet for your clothes, and carpet that adds warmth to the space (and your toes). The bathroom features marble floors and black and white tiled walls. Pamper yourself with the full-sized rain shower, very soft towels and Dr. Teal toiletries. Then slip into dreamland in your very comfy queen-sized bed.

description: Cupples Cottage #3: Downtown! Close to JBER!
name: Apartment in Downtown Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Rob2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in May 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to the award winning Cupples Cottages!  This 600sf flat was recently renovated and is beautifully furnished.When built in 1952 by my late grandfather these units were offered fully furnished providing temporary housing primarily to the construction workers living away from their families working on my grandfather's construction crew.  Fast forward over 65 years and 2 generations and the property has returned back to its roots as we welcome short term guests from all over the world!The spaceCupples Cottages offers warm, cozy accommodations at budget friendly prices.  Our goal is to offer something special, unique. The property consists of two duplexes and one single family home totaling four units.  Our cottages offer fully equipped kitchens, dining room, living room, bedroom and a single bath.  Each unit features an electric fireplace and a wifi enabled smart tv, ready for you to log into your favorite streaming service!We currently offer four 1 bedroom apartment style cottages and a 2 bedroom single family home.  When complete, the property will feature gated security access, onsite bike rentals (currently available!) and will boast over 10,000sf of outdoor lawn/garden green space. It promises to be a property unlike any other in downtown Anchorage.Find us on social media (you know where, the thumbs up place) by searching "Cupples Cottages" and like our page, this way you can watch our progress as we grow!IMPORTANT POLICIES:NO parties or group gatheringsNO petsNO smoking of any kind inside the cottagesExterior 24 hour video surveillance is utilized to help us ensure compliance of these policies.  Guests who violate the above policies will be subject to additional fee and cleaning charges.Recreational marijuana users:  While use of marijuana is legal in the state of Alaska, Cupples Cottages is a "marijuana free zone". If you intend to use marijuana during your trip to Alaska, we are not the right fit for you. Please find a different listing. Due to odor transfer from skin, hair and clothing which results in odors entering and permeating our cottages we request our guests remain "marijuana free" for the duration of their stay regardless of where you may choose to consume. (This policy is in place due to past experiences)

more description: Historical renovation in progress to bring this  504 sq ft C Street Cottage back to it's original 1945 state. Meanwhile, it is ready for you to rest your head. Cottage is listed in the City of Anchorage's Historical Homes Guide.  Complete kitchen, bath, laundry. The bedroom does not have a door as there is no heat source inside, but the wall furnace in the living room keeps the place super cozy. 2 bus stops steps away, Downtown park is a block away, 2 blocks to restaurants and shops.The spacePlease note the bathroom is inside the bedroom, so any Guests sleeping on the living room sofa bed will have to access the bathroom through the bedroom doorway. There will be fruit and enough coffee, tea, and hot cocoa to get you through your first morning.

description: Modern & Unique South Anchorage Home
name: Home in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by Josi6 guests ·  · 3 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in October 2015**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: This South Anchorage home is clean, open and bright with a unique modern design. The property is fully equipped with everything you will need in order to cook, relax and unwind after a long day. The location of this home is a perfect launching point for daily adventures in the Anchorage area and offers quick access to the Seward Highway. Chugach State Park hiking trails are a short 10-minute drive away. The home is 15 minutes from Downtown Anchorage and 10 minutes from the airport.The spaceThe unique design of this home includes white washed pine tongue and groove ceiling, a spiral staircase and special Alaskan accents. Windows and French doors fill the home with light from every corner all year round. Home is nestled on a large lot with mature birch trees, charming landscaping and a fully fenced-in yard. The southwest facing front law is perfect for relaxing outdoors and enjoying the summer sun.

name: Loft in Downtown Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire loft hosted by Edward2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in January 2020**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at Skyline Alaska, located in a quiet area of downtown Anchorage with private parking. This modern studio has polished concrete floors, high ceilings and tall doors, which create a spacious feel. We are walking distance to restaurants, pubs, cafes and galleries, one block from the Anchorage Railroad Depot, and 2 blocks from the Anchorage Coastal Trail.The spaceThere's a keypad entry into the building lobby and another for your room. You will receive codes the day of your arrival.
The kitchen is equipped with a gas stove/oven, microwave, dishwasher and refrigerator/freezer; as well as dishes, glasses, flatware, pots/pans, spices and cooking oil.  The main area features a comfortable loveseat, recliner, Roku TV and a counter-height table for dining. The bedroom has a large bed and wardrobe for your clothes. Pamper yourself with a full-sized shower, very soft towels and Dr. Teal toiletries. Then slip into dreamland in your very comfy queen-sized bed.

description: #1 Lower Level Cozy 2BR/1BA Unit in U-Med District
name: Apartment in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Amanda5 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in March 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: This is a 2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment in a fourplex. It’s recently been remodeled and almost everything in it is new! It’s a secure building, with a code to get in the entryway and another code to enter the unit. Everything is separate except the entryway and laundry room. With two reserved parking spaces in front of the building for you.The spaceKitchen~The kitchen is fully equipped with what you need for your stay: fridge, dishwasher, stove/oven, microwave, coffee maker, electric kettle, toaster, electric grill, blender, pots, pans, utensils, dishes, etc! Also provided are some nonperishables for you to enjoy. Living Room~A comfy couch to relax on and a TV with Roku to enjoy, what more do you need? Well the entertainment center is also an electric fireplace to keep you cozy and warm. Also provided are some games and toys/books for families of little ones. Bedrooms~Bedroom 1 has a queen bed and bedroom 2 has a double bed, they both have a nightstand, extra bedding if needed, and hangers in the closet. Bedroom 1 also has a dresser.*If needed, a pack n play can be provided for those traveling with small children. *We can also provide a queen size air mattress if more sleeping space is required. Just message me!Bathroom~A couple sets of towels are provided, as well as shampoo/conditioner/body wash and a hair dryer. Laundry Room~The laundry room is shared with the tenants in the building. We provide detergent and dryer sheets. Building~ The building is made up of four units, the unit available is on the bottom floor. Three of the four units are ran as Airbnb’s. The current tenants are nice and shouldn’t bother you at all. If for any reason you have a problem, message/call me right away!

description: Stylish, squeaky clean & quiet loft near Prov, UAA
name: Guest suite in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire guest suite hosted by Chad2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in January 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Spotless, cozy 1BR remodel just blocks from Providence and UAA. A small unit with a closet kitchenette, vaulted ceilings and bright south windows. New mattresses & linens. Leather couch, 50" Smart TV. Great for UAA and med travelers. 7 miles to the airport. No stove/oven/cooking. Walking distance to Starbucks, Thai Kitchen, Serrano's, McDs, Taco Bell, Japanese, Himalayan, Uncle Joe's Pizza, Blue Fox Bar & Hawaiian BBQ! Private keycode and parking.The spaceThis recently renovated AirBnB space is as quiet and as clean as any in Anchorage. The cozy unit has a great room with sectional couch and big TV. The other end is a brand-new kitchenette. There's also a spotless bedroom and a modern bathroom. We take great pride in maintaining our 5-start cleanliness rating. Many guests have called this unit the cleanest AirBnB they've ever seen. All bedding, towels and accessories are new. Theres a “Smart TV” with access to Netflix, Roku, Amazon Prime and many other apps  but there's no cable. In the kitchenette you'll find a microwave, small fridge/freezer, Keurig and hot water, also flatware, dishes and cups/glasses to make takeout more pleasant. Works great for takeout and morning coffee, but lacks a kitchen so it's not ideal for meal prep or cleanup. Hit me up if you want restaurant recommendations, we love eating out.

description: Skyline 201: Alaska Railroad 1-Bedroom Suite
name: Loft in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire loft hosted by Edward4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in January 2020**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
Enjoy a stylish live-work experience at this centrally-located modern suite, located in the heart of downtown Anchorage. With a fully equipped kitchen and mountain and coastal views this room pays tribute to the Alaska railroad, whose depot is just down the hill. Your relaxing suite to rest between your Alaskan adventures couldn't have a better location: 4min walk to the start of the Coastal Trail w/ views of Denali, many great restaurants and night spots, and a12min walk to the Museum.The spaceThere's a keypad entry into the building lobby and another for your room. You will receive codes the day of your arrival.
This 1 bedroom/1 bath suite is a perfect space for two but can sleep two extra guests on the queen-size sleeper sofa. Welcomed by a tall maple entrance door, you first enter a large open area that features large windows, high ceilings, polished concrete floors and a maple pocket door that separates the bedroom. The chic black and white kitchen is furnished with a gas stove/oven, microwave, dishwasher and refrigerator/freezer; as well as dishes, glasses, flatware, pots/pans, spices and cooking oil. Everything you need to cook basic meals. The main area features comfortable seating, Roku TV and a counter-height table for dining. A wool carpet adds warmth to the space (and your toes). The bedroom has a large bed and wardrobe for your clothes. Pamper yourself with a full-sized shower, marble floors, black and white tiled walls, very soft towels and Dr. Teal toiletries. Then slip into dreamland in your very comfy queen-sized bed.

more description: Our cozy little studio is located in the heart of Spenard (Anchorage, AK) an awesome walk/bike friendly neighborhood. Just a 20 min walk to downtown and a short walk to Bear Tooth Theatrepub, Spenard Roadhouse, Middle Way Café, Hearth Artisan Pizza, Kaladi Brothers Coffee, Grocery Stores, and Walgreen's.  Washer/dryer free onsite. We provide handmade soap finely crafted right down the street by Denali Dreams Soap Company. Everything you need to have an enjoyable stay is provided for you.The spaceLocated in the heart of Spenard this property is conveniently close to downtown (30 minute walk or 6 minute drive), midtown (10 minute walk) and the airport is about a 10 to 13 minute drive away. Free Wi-Fi and a beautiful fenced yard. You will be staying within a block or two of Bear Tooth Theatrepub, Spenard Roadhouse, Mama O's, Chilkoot Charlie's (right next door), Buckeroo Club, Anchorage Cycle, Celestial Sweets Boutique, Cafe AK, Middle Way Café. Only a few blocks away is Carrs Grocery Store, Walgreen's, REI, Title Wave Books, Tommy's Burger Stop,  La Bodega, Buckeroo Club. Local Spenard Farmers Market located directly across the street from the property (Saturday's only May - September 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM).  In addition, Food Truck Carnival happens every Thursday for lunch across the street (May - September from 11:00 AM to 2:00 PM).

description: Relax with amazing 360° views in this tiny cabin!
name: Tiny home in Palmer
unit rental details: Tiny home hosted by Chris And Karen2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in December 2015**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: The Glacier Breeze cabin is tucked away in the Knik River Valley, surrounded in all directions by amazing views of the beautiful Chugach Mountains. Be close to many great Alaskan experiences while being able to relax and feel like you truly are in the last frontier and not just in another town. With moose right outside your window, the northern lights dancing above the roof and a fire crackling in the stove ,Glacier Breeze can give you a great sample of what makes Alaska so unique and awesome.The spaceThe 280 sq ft open floor plan cabin is delightfully set up for a comfortable stay for up to two people.  Perfect for a romantic getaway, an adventure home base or just an escape from the hustle of town. Or even all of the above! With Ted Stevens airport only one hour away,  the cabin also makes for great destination to start or end your trip to get a great nights sleep while getting that first, or final, taste of the tranquil Alaskan surroundings. With plenty of activities to do in the area, even in the winter, the cabin also makes for an excellent home base for an extended stay. Worried about being surprised by the cleaning fees and checkout chores?  You can already begin to relax!  We do not have a cleaning fee and the only thing we ask at check out is to make sure you have your stuff and to put the heat on low if it’s freezing out. After all, it’s you that’s here on vacation, not us! So what’s the cabin have to offer you? It may be a tiny cabin, but it’s loaded with comforts! The open floor plan living area has a comfortable love seat with entertainment provided via a TV loaded with several streaming services. If you would prefer some auditory entertainment, an Alexa speaker is waiting for your request for soothing tunes of your choice to further enhance the already relaxing atmosphere. Should you prefer to just unplug from the outside world you can choose from assorted board games or Alaskan themed books to chill out with. A wood stove with supplied firewood will keep you toasty through the chilly Alaskan nights , we will of coarse be glad to explain how to use it should you not be familiar with operating one. The full size memory foam Murphy bed is layered in soft, hypoallergenic and sustainably sourced bamboo sheets topped by a warm down alternative comforter. Add in the crackling sound of the wood slowly burning in the stove and you will for sure get a great nights sleep! Blackout blinds are installed on the windows for those not so dark summer Alaskan nights. The amply stocked kitchen includes a stove, full size refrigerator, Kureg and drip coffee pots, toaster, blender, crock pot, pans and the utensils you need to prepare your favorite meals.  Need something that’s not on hand, let us know and we may have it to bring out to the cabin for you to use.  Not up to cooking? We would be glad to recommend a local restaurant for what you are in the mood for. The Palmer area has some great locally owned restaurants, many that serve locally sourced foods. The private bathroom features a tub/shower combo with body wash, shampoo and conditioner provided. Fast 50mb Wifi is provided for your entertainment and work needs. Bear spray and bug spray are also supplied to help keep some of the more aggressive residents at bay while out exploring the area. Please do let us know if you use the bear spray so we can replace it with a new one for the next guests, and we aren’t going to lie, we would want to hear the story! As if all that was not all the reason you needed to stay at Glacier Breeze, the cabin is conveniently located nearby several popular attractions:Knik Glacier tours and winter fat tire bike access to glacier - 1 mile Knik Glacier Helicopter tours. Several glacier tour options, heli-skiing, heli-hiking, dog sledding on the glacier in the summer and custom tours to create your own adventure.   - 2 miles Pioneer Ridge trailhead - 4 miles 49th State Motor Tours - 13 milesReindeer Farm - 14 miles Alaska Horse Adventures - 14 milesPyrah’s Pioneer Peak Farm - 15 miles Musk Ox Farm - 21 miles Alaska Zipline Adventure Park - 23 milesHatcher Pass Area - 36 miles Snowhook Dogsledding, Snowmachine and ATV tours - 1 hour awayMatanuska Glacier Tours - 1 1/2 hour awayAnd much more to do as well that you can easily be relaxing back at the Glacier Breeze after a day of making lifelong memories. ** Special notes for winter: As you can imagine, Alaska requires some extra effort in the winter. We will do our absolute best to make sure that you have as easy of a time as possible with any weather mother nature may toss at us. If at anytime you have any concerns, please reach out to us and we will assist you the best we can!- If snow and ice are present, please use extra caution with footing. We do everything we can to provide for safe traction, but just like everywhere in Alaska in winter, it is a constant battle with mother nature! -Please remove any ice cleats before entering the cabin to prevent damage to floor. -There is a snow shovel and ice melt provided should you need it, though we will also clear snow as required, typically after around 3" of new snow. Please understand that snow clearing operations in the area can occur at all hours of the day and night creating periodic noise.  - An extension cord is provided outside for plugging in vehicles, should temperatures make it necessary. -We recommend bringing some food just in case you need to wait for plows to clear the roads to get back to town.  It's a good idea to travel with some in your vehicle in general , in case you get stuck on the roadside somewhere.Most of all we pride ourselves on not just the great accommodations, but the high level of hospitality that comes along with your stay.  Our goal is to have you not wanting to leave and especially looking forward to coming back!

more description: Historical renovation in progress to bring this  504 sq ft C Street Cottage back to it's original 1945 state. Meanwhile, it is ready for you to rest your head. Cottage is listed in the City of Anchorage's Historical Homes Guide.  Complete kitchen, bath, laundry. The bedroom does not have a door as there is no heat source inside, but the wall furnace in the living room keeps the place super cozy. 2 bus stops steps away, Downtown park is a block away, 2 blocks to restaurants and shops.The spacePlease note the bathroom is inside the bedroom, so any Guests sleeping on the living room sofa bed will have to access the bathroom through the bedroom doorway. There will be fruit and enough coffee, tea, and hot cocoa to get you through your first morning.

unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Amanda5 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in March 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: This is a 2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment in a fourplex. It’s recently been remodeled and almost everything in it is new! It’s a secure building, with a code to get in the entryway and another code to enter the unit. Everything is separate except the entryway and laundry room. With two reserved parking spaces in front of the building for you.The spaceKitchen~The kitchen is fully equipped with what you need for your stay: fridge, dishwasher, stove/oven, microwave, coffee maker, electric kettle, toaster, electric grill, blender, pots, pans, utensils, dishes, etc! Also provided are some nonperishables for you to enjoy. Living Room~A comfy couch to relax on and a TV with Roku to enjoy, what more do you need? Well the entertainment center is also an electric fireplace to keep you cozy and warm. Also provided are some games and toys/books for families of little ones. Bedrooms~Bedroom 1 has a queen bed and bedroom 2 has a double bed, they both have a nightstand, extra bedding if needed, and hangers in the closet. Bedroom 1 also has a dresser.*If needed, a pack n play can be provided for those traveling with small children. *We can also provide a queen size air mattress if more sleeping space is required. Just message me!Bathroom~A couple sets of towels are provided, as well as shampoo/conditioner/body wash and a hair dryer. Laundry Room~The laundry room is shared with the tenants in the building. We provide detergent and dryer sheets. Building~ The building is made up of four units, the unit available is on the bottom floor. Three of the four units are ran as Airbnb’s. The current tenants are nice and shouldn’t bother you at all. If for any reason you have a problem, message/call me right away!

name: Loft in Downtown Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire loft hosted by Edward3 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 3 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in January 2020**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at Skyline Alaska, located in a quiet area of downtown Anchorage with private parking. This modern studio has polished concrete floors, high ceilings and tall doors, which create a spacious feel. We are walking distance to restaurants, pubs, cafes and galleries, one block from the Anchorage Railroad Depot, and 2 blocks from the Anchorage Coastal Trail.The spaceThere's a keypad entry into the building lobby and another for your room. You will receive codes the day of your arrival.
This 1 bedroom/1 bath suite is the perfect space for two but can sleep one extra guest on a queen air mattress or twin rollaway (request before arrival). Welcomed by a tall maple entrance door, you first enter the contemporary design which features large windows, high ceilings, polished concrete floors and a maple pocket door separating the bedroom. The chic black and white kitchen is furnished with a gas stove/oven, microwave, dishwasher and refrigerator/freezer; as well as dishes, glasses, flatware, pots/pans, spices and cooking oil. Everything you need to cook basic meals. The main area features comfortable seating, Roku TV and a dining table that seats four. The bedroom has a large bed, a closet for your clothes, and carpet that adds warmth to the space (and your toes). The bathroom features marble floors and black and white tiled walls. Pamper yourself with a full-sized shower, very soft towels and Dr. Teal toiletries. Then slip into dreamland in your very comfy queen-sized bed.

more description: Oakleys Cottage is perfect for couples, singles, adventurers, and business travelers. We are located in the small town of Eagle River, which is about a 30 minute drive from Ted Stevens Anchorage International Airport, and the towns of Palmer and Wasilla are located about 30 minutes north.  Tikahtnu (Muldoon) Mall is a short 15 minute drive away and includes restaurants, clothing stores, and a movie theater.  Fred Meyers, Carrs (Safeway), and Walmart are all only a 5 minute drive away.The spaceOne complete bedroom with a dresser so you don't have to live out of your suitcase. Blackout curtains hang on the windows, so the midnight sun won’t affect your sleep schedule.

more description: MIL Suite w/private entrance in convenient Midtown location. Smart TVs. Full size kitchen w/gas stove. Private washer/dryer. Fitness room. Enjoy the beautiful views of trees, trails, and creek from the patio. Close to Dimond Mall, Costco, Breweries, and Restaurants. You also have direct access to one of Anchorage’s favorite trail systems - Campbell Creek Trail. Great for walking/running, kayaking, and bike riding in summer and cross country skiing in winter. 10 minutes from the airport!The space2BR/2BA MIL suite. Private entrance. Sleeps up to 4 guests. One parking spot in driveway. Free off street parking available for any additional vehicles.**DISCLAIMER - We do live upstairs and there is another occupied guest suite adjacent to the unit, so there is a potential for some noise but we will try to keep the noise to a minimum during your stay.**A very cute mini Goldendoodle and Alaskan Husky lives on the property. Feel free to pet them whenever you’d like, they love people!

more description: This classy 1 bedroom apt within a duplex boasts an open-plan living with private entry and private parking. This fully furnished relaxing space boasts a crisp, contemporary feel while comfortable and inviting. Enjoy a queen size bed, private bathroom, kitchen, huge yard, and large windows that provide natural light. Located in a quiet residential neighborhood thats only 5 minutes from the Airport and centrally located for quick access to the downtown area. It's the ideal base to explore Alaska.The spaceTake in the peaceful atmosphere out in the yard while watching the birds play or stay inside and enjoy high speed WIFI for buisness or entertainment needs. We offer HDTV with roku access to enjoy all your streaming accounts. In addition, there is an office space, toiletries, kitchenware for cooking a full meal, washer and dryer, iron, floor heating to keep you warm, and closet space. We have you covered so relax and have some fun!!

number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 shared bath**__**Joined in July 2015**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to Joy's Cozy Habitat! Quiet and cozy bedroom that includes One Queen Bed, RokuTv, and free WiFi. The shared bathroom is for guest use only. Four minute drive to Jewel Lake and just 10 minutes from the airport. Joy's habitat is within walking distance of public transportation and a plethora of stores/restaurants! Please feel free to take advantage of the shared living room and kitchen. Coffee and tea is available upon checkin. Welcome Home!The spaceJoy's Cozy Habitat is located in a quiet and safe neighborhood. There are two guest bedrooms and a bathroom on the first floor. The bathroom is shared between the guests unless you have booked both rooms then it's all yours! For your comfort, extra blankets and pillows can be found within the bedroom closet. Clean towels and toiletries are ready for your use. The bedroom do not come loaded with cable however, you can enjoy the free Roku movies available on Roku TV. Please feel free to use your own online streaming subscriptions as free Wifi is available.   The living room, laundry, and kitchen are all conveniently located on the first floor for your use. The Kitchen has refrigerator, microwave and coffee maker for your use. If you would like to cook, please reach out to me for more instructions. Entry is keyless, you will be given a code that will be active only during your stay. This will allow you the ability to check-in and check-out leisurely.   Check in is 5pm or after. Check out is 11am. Please do not book if those times do not work for you you. I work a lot and I might not be home much but please do not hesitate to contact me and let me know if you need anything. I will do my best to make your stay as comfortable as possible.  Please clean up behind yourself when using all shared areas.   Please remove shoes at the door as there is no shoes in the house.   Please remain on the first floor as the upstairs area is off limits.  Welcome Home!

name: Guest suite in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire guest suite hosted by Ron2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in September 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Continue your amazing Alaska adventure with a quiet hillside retreat. Mountain views and the sounds of a creek from the valley below welcome you to an open and spacious one bedroom, one bathroom In-Law apartment outside of the city with a full kitchen and private entrance. Enjoy a gem of a location with one of the best views in Anchorage while sitting outside next to the fire pit. Moose, bear, and occasional lynx sightings are a common and delightful perk of this location.The spaceThis apartment faces southeast over Rabbit Creek valley with amazing views. You will enjoy a full galley kitchen stocked with all the cooking, baking, and preparation utensils you need. The other furnishings ensure a comfortable stay. There is a storage area which allows your luggage to conveniently stay out of sight. In the living room you'll find a 40" TV with a Netflix subscription for evenings in and weather days. The bedroom has a full dresser and walk-in closet, with shelving for your personal items.  The outdoor area in front of the apartment is yours to enjoy during your stay: As a guest you'll have exclusive use of the yard, firepit, grill, and outdoor furniture seen in the pictures outside the apartment.The only shared space is the laundry room which is privately accessible by both this apartment and the main home in which we live.

more description: The beauty of the Alaskan wilderness awaits at this 2-bed, 1-bath, ground-floor Anchorage vacation rental. Nestled on the west side of Chugach State Park, this unit provides easy access to 9,000 square miles of fishing, kayaking, and hiking, as well as the world-famous glaciers. After a day of exploring, head to Downtown Anchorage for some local king crab at Simon and Seafort’s, or sip on a beer from Glacier Brewhouse. Finish the day with your loved ones back at this well-appointed apartment!The spaceFree WiFi | In-Unit Laundry  Boasting all the essential comforts, this conveniently located apartment is perfect for outdoor enthusiasts, couples, or small families looking to get outside and experience the best of Alaska! Bedroom 1: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed KITCHEN: Well equipped, cooking basics, cookware, spices, toaster, knife setMAIN FEATURES: One Widescreen TV with FireCube and soundbar, plus one Roku TV, 4-person dining table, open floor plan, luggage racks, vacuumOUTDOOR FEATURES: Shared Backyard; gazebo w/ chairs, table, fire pitCOFFEE BAR: Drip coffee maker, Keurig, K-Cups, sugar, eco-friendly children’s ware, espresso maker, magic bullet blenderGENERAL: Washer & dryer, towels/linens, hair dryer, central heat, complimentary toiletriesFAQ: Ground unit, owners on-site, NO dishwasher, NO central A/CPARKING: Designated parking (1 vehicle), street parking

more description: This South Anchorage home is clean, open and bright with a unique modern design. The property is fully equipped with everything you will need in order to cook, relax and unwind after a long day. The location of this home is a perfect launching point for daily adventures in the Anchorage area and offers quick access to the Seward Highway. Chugach State Park hiking trails are a short 10-minute drive away. The home is 15 minutes from Downtown Anchorage and 10 minutes from the airport.The spaceThe unique design of this home includes white washed pine tongue and groove ceiling, a spiral staircase and special Alaskan accents. Windows and French doors fill the home with light from every corner all year round. Home is nestled on a large lot with mature birch trees, charming landscaping and a fully fenced-in yard. The southwest facing front law is perfect for relaxing outdoors and enjoying the summer sun.
