Nestled  on a quiet midtown street near the airport & within walking distance of several restaurants. This room features a queen sized bed, a bunk bed, a fold out couch, a mini-fridge, and Dish TV. This Lodge is under new ownership & we are very excited provide a peaceful Alaskan family experience.The spaceThis space is located within a 20 room Lodge/Hostel. There are a mixture of long term guests and short terms guests. This space has room to sleep 6, with a queen sized bed, bunk beds, and a pull out sofa bed. description: High End Modern Apartment in Heart of Anchorage
name: Guest suite in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire guest suite hosted by Dylan3 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 3 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in June 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Discover the wonders that Anchorage has to offer from this newly remodeled 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment right in the heart of the city. This space also has a beautiful kitchen for you to cook your own home-made meals. Enjoy very high-end appliances and furnishings during your stay in the land of the midnight sun! Within walking distance to the legendary Moose's Tooth Pub and Pizzeria, the Chester Creek Trails which go throughout the entire city, and many other midtown gems!The spaceEnjoy your stay at this amazing home in the best location in all of Anchorage! Rogers park has a long history and heritage that dates back to before Alaska was even a state. You will be within walking distance to the famous Anchorage Green Belt Trail that travels across the entire city and ends up at the Tony Knowles Coastal Trail, where you can take in all the sites from the amazing Anchorage coastline. This area is centrally located in town so you are close to everything you will want to be. There are many great restaurants right in the area as well, including the world famous Moose’s Tooth Pub and Pizzeria. If you are interested, make sure to get a slice pizza at one of the most famous pub and pizza places in the nation! Also very close to several hospitals in town which makes this a great stay for traveling nurses!The apartment has been newly remodeled to enhance your comfort while you stay here. The bedroom is equipped with a full-size on bottom/twin-size on top bunk bed, a genuine leather sofa, and a smart TV. The kitchen has all new modern appliances and a large counter space for you to make all your home-made meals if you so desire. Private driveway parking is also available.If you are wanting to get outdoors and see all the wonders and beauty that Alaska has to offer, this is a great place to call home base while you are adventuring in the last frontier!

more description: This is a 2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment in a fourplex. It’s recently been remodeled and almost everything in it is new! It’s a secure building, with a code to get in the entryway and another code to enter the unit. Everything is separate except the entryway and laundry room. With two reserved parking spaces in front of the building for you.The spaceKitchen~The kitchen is fully equipped with what you need for your stay: fridge, dishwasher, stove/oven, microwave, coffee maker, electric kettle, toaster, electric grill, blender, pots, pans, utensils, dishes, etc! Also provided are some nonperishables for you to enjoy. Living Room~A comfy couch to relax on and a TV with Roku to enjoy, what more do you need? Well the entertainment center is also an electric fireplace to keep you cozy and warm. Also provided are some games and toys/books for families of little ones. Bedrooms~Bedroom 1 has a queen bed and bedroom 2 has a double bed, they both have a nightstand, extra bedding if needed, and hangers in the closet. Bedroom 1 also has a dresser.*If needed, a pack n play can be provided for those traveling with small children. *We can also provide a queen size air mattress if more sleeping space is required. Just message me!Bathroom~A couple sets of towels are provided, as well as shampoo/conditioner/body wash and a hair dryer. Laundry Room~The laundry room is shared with the tenants in the building. We provide detergent and dryer sheets. Building~ The building is made up of four units, the unit available is on the bottom floor. Three of the four units are ran as Airbnb’s. The current tenants are nice and shouldn’t bother you at all. If for any reason you have a problem, message/call me right away!

name: Apartment in Downtown Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Rob2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in May 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to the award winning Cupples Cottages!  This 600sf flat was recently renovated and is beautifully furnished.When built in 1952 by my late grandfather these units were offered fully furnished providing temporary housing primarily to the construction workers living away from their families working on my grandfather's construction crew.  Fast forward over 65 years and 2 generations and the property has returned back to its roots as we welcome short term guests from all over the world!The spaceCupples Cottages offers warm, cozy accommodations at budget friendly prices.  Our goal is to offer something special, unique. The property consists of two duplexes and one single family home totaling four units.  Our cottages offer fully equipped kitchens, dining room, living room, bedroom and a single bath.  Each unit features an electric fireplace and a wifi enabled smart tv, ready for you to log into your favorite streaming service!We currently offer four 1 bedroom apartment style cottages and a 2 bedroom single family home.  When complete, the property will feature gated security access, onsite bike rentals (currently available!) and will boast over 10,000sf of outdoor lawn/garden green space. It promises to be a property unlike any other in downtown Anchorage.Find us on social media (you know where, the thumbs up place) by searching "Cupples Cottages" and like our page, this way you can watch our progress as we grow!IMPORTANT POLICIES:NO parties or group gatheringsNO petsNO smoking of any kind inside the cottagesExterior 24 hour video surveillance is utilized to help us ensure compliance of these policies.  Guests who violate the above policies will be subject to additional fee and cleaning charges.Recreational marijuana users:  While use of marijuana is legal in the state of Alaska, Cupples Cottages is a "marijuana free zone". If you intend to use marijuana during your trip to Alaska, we are not the right fit for you. Please find a different listing. Due to odor transfer from skin, hair and clothing which results in odors entering and permeating our cottages we request our guests remain "marijuana free" for the duration of their stay regardless of where you may choose to consume. (This policy is in place due to past experiences)

more description: Enjoy your time in Anchorage at our newly fully remodeled, amazing three bedroom Condo! It is located in a nice and quiet neighborhood but still close to several  grocery stores. Let us know if you have little ones and we can have a toddler bed, a pack n play and high chair ready for you! Enjoy a quiet evening after exploring beautiful Anchorage, in front of the indoor fire place, playing a game or reading a book about trapping in Alaska! On a warm summer day enjoy the backyard and BBQ!The spaceThe living room, a half bath and kitchen are downstairs and the 3 bedrooms and full bath with bathtub are upstairsWe have a queen size air mattress that can be setup in the big bedroom if you require this during your stay for 7-8 people. 6 guests or less we won’t setup the air mattress unless requested!

more description: 15 miles north of Anchorage our property is 4 acres of woodlands with a view of the mountains and frequent visits from Alaska wildlife.   We live within 5 miles of 7 different public access lakes & are between Anchorage & the Matanuska Susitna Valley. There is additional off street parking for a boat and/or RV.   We also have several canoe's available for our guests use.The spaceThe one good thing about Anchorage is you only have to drive 15 minutes to visit Alaska.  Our property is in Alaska.   We are not in a large city but in a rural area near Anchorage.  It is a quite safe and private area 4 acre property with wonderful neighbors and numerous Alaskan adventures close by.   We have friends and neighbors who are dog mushers and several of them have raced in the Iditarod dog sled race.   There are seven public lakes within 5 miles of our home, dog mushing trails, fishing, hiking, and canoeing opportunities close by.   We will gladly point you in the right direction for fishing opportunities or even lend you one of our canoes.     We love Alaska and the spectacular views and opportunities it offers. We are within an hour’s drive to several glaciers, old gold mines, historic Alaska sites and numerous other adventures within minutes of our door.   It’s a short 20 minute drive from our house to downtown Anchorage and we are within 30 minutes of the Anchorage International Airport.

more description: Welcome to Raspberry Suites, a beautiful 1 bedroom apartment with VIEWS of the Chugach Mountains. Thoughtfully decorated with "Alaskana" style and one of a kind Alaska Native art. This rustic retreat is right in the city and truly is the best of both worlds.5 minute drive to airport10 minute drive to downtown5 minute walk to DeLong Lake5 minute walk to restaurants, coffee shop, liquor store, BUS STOPClose to Kincaid ParkApartment is on the second floor and is a walk upNo Smokers AllowedThe spaceThis is a one bedroom, one bathroom top floor apartment with MOUNTAIN VIEWS from the apartment.  This apartment is on the second floor and is a walk up.KING size bedHUGE shared rooftop deck space with view of mountainsFull kitchenPrivate in unit free LAUNDRY. Covered parking space (no shoveling snow off your car)The building has 4 private apartments, each have their own covered parking space.  All of the apartments share a rooftop patio on top of the carport and share the backyard.  The carport patio has VIEWS of the Chugach Mountains!Trax Outdoor Center 2.0 has across the street has cross country ski rentals and lessons in the winter and they have paddle boards for rent in the summer.  Kincaid Park is right down the road and is a great place to cross country ski and see moose.  Delong lake is less than a 10 minute walk and is nice for summer swimming, paddle boarding, and winter ice fishing.

number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in January 2020**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
TEnjoy a stylish experience at Skyline Alaska, located in a quiet area of downtown Anchorage with private parking. This modern studio has polished concrete floors, high ceilings and tall doors, which create a spacious feel. We are walking distance to restaurants, pubs, cafes and galleries, one block from the Anchorage Railroad Depot, and 2 blocks from the Anchorage Coastal Trail.The spaceThere's a keypad entry into the building lobby and another for your room. You will receive codes the day of your arrival.
This 1 bedroom/1 bath unit is the perfect space for two but can sleep one extra guest on the queen-size sleeper sofa. Welcomed by a tall maple entrance door, you first enter the contemporary design which features large windows, high ceilings, Portuguese cork floors and a maple pocket door separating the bedroom. The chic black and white kitchen is furnished with a gas stove/oven, microwave, dishwasher and refrigerator/freezer; as well as dishes, glasses, flatware, pots/pans, spices and cooking oil. Everything you need to cook basic meals. The main area features comfortable seating, Roku TV and a dining table that seats four. The bedroom has a large bed, a closet for your clothes, and carpet that adds warmth to the space (and your toes). The bathroom features marble floors and black and white tiled walls. Pamper yourself in the walk-in shower (with a bench), very soft towels and Dr. Teal toiletries. Then slip into dreamland in your very comfy queen-sized bed.

more description: Welcome to your home away from home. Conveniently located less than 3 miles from the airport, and under 10 minutes from downtown, local parks, stores & entertainment, this clean and cozy boho inspired home is perfect for an extended vacation, business travel or just a weekend getaway. We do strive to be a family friendly home, providing amenities such as a high chair, pack & play, sound machine, baby bath and games/toys.We do ask that before requesting, please ensure you are verified by Airbnb.The spaceThe Tanglewood house features an open living room and dining room, 2 bedrooms/1 bath, washer and dryer in unit, Wi-Fi, SmartTVs with streaming in each room, a deck out back overlooking a large unfenced backyard. We frequently have moose visits in the summer! We also have a number of raspberry bushes that you may pick through during the summer months.-Recently renovated 2 bedroom / 1 bath in upstairs unit of duplex-Private entrance with keyless entry-Located on a quiet street of a residential neighborhood in the Turnagain area -accommodates up to 5 GUESTS-Bedroom 1 offers a QUEEN memory foam mattress -Bedroom 2 offers a QUEEN memory foam mattress-Additional air mattress provided in back closet as needed.-Family friendly- we offer a pack and play and sound machine for your little one. We also have a couple sleds that can be used during the winter. -For yours and our safety, we do have security cameras located around the property. These can be found in the front, on the right side, left side, back deck and shed area. These are only used in the case of a necessary situation or emergency.Your comfort and experience is so important to us. We want you to love this home as much as we do. If there is any troubles during your stay, we are a call or text away

more description: Oakleys Cottage is perfect for couples, singles, adventurers, and business travelers. We are located in the small town of Eagle River, which is about a 30 minute drive from Ted Stevens Anchorage International Airport, and the towns of Palmer and Wasilla are located about 30 minutes north.  Tikahtnu (Muldoon) Mall is a short 15 minute drive away and includes restaurants, clothing stores, and a movie theater.  Fred Meyers, Carrs (Safeway), and Walmart are all only a 5 minute drive away.The spaceOne complete bedroom with a dresser so you don't have to live out of your suitcase. Blackout curtains hang on the windows, so the midnight sun won’t affect your sleep schedule.

description: Rustic ski-in/out cabin with wood stove, spacious deck, free Wifi, & private W/D
name: Cabin in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire cabin hosted by Vacasa Alaska6 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 4 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in May 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
The spaceAlpine Meadows Log CabinDisconnect and get your fill of classic cabin living at this rustic ski-in/ski-out escape at the base of Alyeska Resort! There is no WiFi at this escape, yet you won't even notice with skiing, snowboarding, hiking, mountain biking, and so much more ready to keep you busy each day. You'll love being located in central Girdwood and minutes from Alyeska Resort!

When you find a bit of downtime inside, highlights include a cozy wood stove for cold winter nights, an expansive deck for summertime sunbathing or nighttime stargazing, and expansive windows that allow natural light and views of the surrounding trees to come in. Speaking of downtime, a vacation isn't complete without tasty meals, so bring along your favorite recipes to prepare in the full kitchen outfitted with all of the appliances and cookware you are used to. And, before hitting the hay, throw dirty clothes in the private washer and dryer to keep hiking and skiing apparel fresh for the next day's adventures.

This is your ticket to get back to the simpler times and bask in the mountain lifestyle!

THINGS TO KNOW
There is no WiFi at this property. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.Parking notes: There is free parking for  vehicles. Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. description: Tucked away two-story home
name: Home in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by RodgerMallory4 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in July 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally located place. The spacious kitchen is fully equipped and comes with a refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, toaster, stove, and everything you'll need to bring your inner chef out! Immerse yourself and unwind in the semi-fenced area.- Shopping mall behind, just a walk away- Pet-friendly, small dogs and cats- Features fireplace, washer/dryer-Visits from local moose- Retail shopping less than a 3 min drive away.The spaceAs you walk in you will have the kitchen on your left. Dining room on the other side and a half step down will be the sunken living room with a vast amount of day light (where there is some). Take the steps upstairs and you'll find that the bedrooms are spacious. Master room provides a queen-sized bed and a single sofa. Enjoy watching tv in different resting positions. The smaller bedroom has two twin beds. Enjoy watching tv in there as well. Nightstands are provided with access to wall plugs on each side. Bathroom has double sinks, and a gracious linen closet. The shower/tub combo and toilet that are separated by another door within the bathroom for additional privacy. In unit washer and dryer are in-between bedrooms in the hallways.

Private bathroom off kitchen with lockable door, brand new vanity, linen closet, and stand up shower. Laundry in heated garage. Common entrance and hallway on main floor.Airbnb dedicated deck on Level 1 and Common Deck on Level 2.

more description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place. You will be in the heart of Anchorage with quick access to just about everything, including mountains and ocean. The Airport Heights neighborhood is one of the most friendly and charming in the city.  Fire Island Rustic Bakeshop is right around the corner.  We are on the Chester Creek greenbelt which connects you to the city bike path system and ski trails.  There are two separate parks/playgrounds just a couple of blocks away.The spaceYou have your own private bedroom, shared bathroom usage, and use of common areas upon request.

more description: Want to explore Anchorage but need a place to stay? Stay at our place! We've furnished our place to be spacious, cozy and inviting while still providing privacy for our guests. We're located in the heart of Anchorage with a walking distance to several local popular restaurants and breweries. Our place is only 5-10 minutes away from the airport and is perfect for families and/or friends. We welcome anyone who's just looking for a place to stay for short term or long term visit!The spaceYou'll love the spacious dining room and full kitchen for any deliveries and/or take-outs from local restaurants. Our apartment can sleep up to 4 people. Two bedrooms with queen beds, 1 bathroom and dining table.

more description: The whole group will enjoy self check-in access to everything from this centrally located room. Nestled  on a quiet midtown street near the airport & within walking distance of several restaurants. This room features a queen sized bed, a bunk bed, a fold out couch, a mini-fridge, and Dish TV. Free WIFI and Laundry are provided with the room. There is shared access to the full service Kitchen. This Lodge is under new ownership & we are very excited provide a peaceful Alaskan family experience.The spaceThis space is located within a 20 room Lodge/Hostel. There are a mixture of long term guests and short terms guests. This space has room to sleep 6, with a queen sized bed, bunk beds, and a pull out sofa bed. This room has a private bathroom, with shared access to the kitchen, laundry, and backyard smoking area.

description: 😎Perfectly located Alaska base in residential area
name: Home in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by Jennifer6 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in December 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: You will be staying in the private top level of an amazing home in the center of town in beautiful, quiet residential area.  The downstairs is also an Airbnb and is completely separate with a private entrance around the back of the home.  Centrally located, it is easy walking distance to lakes, trails, universities, and hospitals!  10 minutes to downtown!  Please ask if you need a rental car, I rent cars and SUV’s through Turo and can provide you with one at an additional fee.The space🖤 1000 square feet in remodeled home.   Private front door entrance.🖤 Plenty of parking in the driveway and in the street. 🖤 5-star hospitality!🖤 Extremely safe neighborhood🖤 10 minutes to downtown and airport.  5 minutes to universities and hospitals🖤 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom in highly coveted College Village in midtown. 🖤 Perfect for families, professionals working remotely, pet owners (fully fenced)🖤 Plenty of parking - 2 cars in the driveway or an RV in the street. 🖤 Fun, comfortable couch and big screen Smart TV in living room🖤 Free fast wifi🖤 High-end stainless steel appliances🖤 Fully stocked and equipped kitchen🖤 Fenced back yard and new deck with Propane grill, lounging chairs🖤 3 block walk to secret Otis Lake. In winter you can ski, ice skate, or snowshoe, and in summer you can canoe, paddleboard, or kayak and have the lake to yourself. The lake is stocked by Fish and Game and my son caught a 12" rainbow with his Danny Dinosaur fishing pole there.

This Townhome comes with all the extras, including wi fi, flat screen with Apple TV, washer, dryer, keurig compostable coffee pods and more. Located next to popular shopping and restaurants. Quiet hours are 10pm to 7am, the living room upstairs is a good place to socialize after 10pm.The spaceThe entire townhome is yours, there are two living rooms, as well as an outdoor area with a fire pit that is shared with other guests. The townhome is located in a fourplex, we Air Bnb all the units at this location so you may meet other travelers like yourself. Please be respectful of the quiet hours 10pm to 7am as you are sharing walls. The living room upstairs is a great place to socialize after 10pm.

name: Apartment in Downtown Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Rob2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in May 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to the award winning Cupples Cottages!  This 600sf flat was recently renovated and is beautifully furnished.When built in 1952 by my late grandfather these units were offered fully furnished providing temporary housing primarily to the construction workers living away from their families working on my grandfather's construction crew.  Fast forward over 65 years and 2 generations and the property has returned back to its roots as we welcome short term guests from all over the world!The spaceCupples Cottages offers warm, cozy accommodations at budget friendly prices.  Our goal is to offer something special, unique. The property consists of two duplexes and one single family home totaling four units.  Our cottages offer fully equipped kitchens, dining room, living room, bedroom and a single bath.  Each unit features an electric fireplace and a wifi enabled smart tv, ready for you to log into your favorite streaming service!We currently offer four 1 bedroom apartment style cottages and a 2 bedroom single family home.  When complete, the property will feature gated security access, onsite bike rentals (currently available!) and will boast over 10,000sf of outdoor lawn/garden green space. It promises to be a property unlike any other in downtown Anchorage.Find us on social media (you know where, the thumbs up place) by searching "Cupples Cottages" and like our page, this way you can watch our progress as we grow!IMPORTANT POLICIES:NO parties or group gatheringsNO petsNO smoking of any kind inside the cottagesExterior 24 hour video surveillance is utilized to help us ensure compliance of these policies.  Guests who violate the above policies will be subject to additional fee and cleaning charges.Recreational marijuana users:  While use of marijuana is legal in the state of Alaska, Cupples Cottages is a "marijuana free zone". If you intend to use marijuana during your trip to Alaska, we are not the right fit for you. Please find a different listing. Due to odor transfer from skin, hair and clothing which results in odors entering and permeating our cottages we request our guests remain "marijuana free" for the duration of their stay regardless of where you may choose to consume. (This policy is in place due to past experiences)

description: Travelers Home Base | Snazzy & Cozy with a Hot Tub
name: Home in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by Ellie2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in June 2014**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Hello traveler. We are travelers too and this is our home base. Why stay here? You'll love it for the reasons we do: Outdoor space like you're far away from the hustle yet a location that gives easy access to heart of the city. The yard is major and there's a HOT TUB on a deck, fire pit, dreamy string lights AND your own carport!  Inside you have a fireplace, giant windows, a big bed, fast wifi & a travel centric vibe. Here you will find authenticity, atmosphere & attention to detail. Welcome.The space--- Overview:o	Idyllic Travelers Home base for all seasons; super cozy in the winter, lots of outdoor living space in the summer. o	Central location to easily gain access to the highlights and necessities of this city and Great State!o	Great for couples, singles, small families o	Entire ground level duplex unito	Private driveway, carport and entrywayo	Full, open kitchen with all the goods. Gas stove/oveno	Cozy living room with luxurious velvet couch and big picture windowso	Wood burning fireplace o	King bed and luxury linenso	Fast fiber interneto	Classic Alaskan, Mid Century and international travel design vibeso	Huge, fully fenced, treed yard with fire pit and string lightso	Outdoor HOT TUB includedo	Minutes from the airporto	Biking/walking/skiing paths right out fronto	Close to restaurants, groceries and attractionso	In-depth details follow, please reach out with questions. Our goal is that your stay is a great fit for you and our home. o	We look forward to having you!   	                        Get to know us! Read on:--- THE HOUSE:Our home is an upper/lower duplex built into the hillside with private entry points; one at street level and one around below.The construction of the home was completed the year prior to the great earthquake of '64 and it rode through it like a champ. In fact, this house became the haven for neighbors who’s homes weren’t so lucky (so we were told). Now, while you rest easy with the knowledge of this house’s Earthquake sustainability please don’t judge its quirks too harshly. Where it falls short, it more than makes up for it in mid century modern charm and character. If you appreciate details, you've come to the right place. When updating and styling we let the house do its own talking and then added some of our stories collected in pictures and art from travels afar. Our mini library offers some vintage Alaskana editions and our personal collection of Lonely Planet guidebooks is there to inspire future wanderings. In the bedroom you have space to hang your clothes or fold them away in the dresser if you’re not the type who just flings open the duffel bag and calls it good. A brand new KING BED commands the room nicely. One thing we’ll always love about hotels is their luxurious white cotton sheets. So that’s what you’ll find here as well, in a thread count of 600 to be exact. Something that is often overlooked in a hotel room: Great coffee! Our local roaster, Kaladi, is amazing and you get to be the judge of that yourself using the drip coffee maker or the pour over system. We have sugar and creamers and some tea options for your morning pleasure. And the shower has you covered with big bottles of shampoo, conditioner and body wash. The large open kitchen has everything you need to cook-in or plate and reheat your to-go meals. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Some important things for your consideration: - Don't see your preferred dates available? Reach out! We are last minute travelers ourselves and can sometimes flex our availability. - Are you a fellow Alaskan coming through the city on a supply run? We have lots of room to explode your shopping, pack, repack and shop again. - We are a young family and we welcome yours. If you have a baby or toddler we can set you up with a lot of things… Also our huge yard is full of toys and play-sets and it’s fully fenced except for the driveway. Just give us a heads up if you are bringing littles. - This space is well suited for up to two adults sharing the bedroom. Children can also be accommodated with floor mat style sleeping arrangements or a pack n play. - We do not have a TV or Dishwasher. We do have great, high speed wifi.- The bathroom is small (shower, no tub) but clean and bright and gets the job done. - This is an upper/lower style duplex. You may hear foot traffic if we are home. We live upstairs, however, in the summer we are in the bush most of the time and in the winter we travel regularly. We are respectful of the quiet hours and please do let us know in advance of your arrival if you have specific concerns about noise.- The fireplace can be used with long burning Duraflame style logs only. One log will be provided for your stay and you can purchase additional logs at local grocery stores. - This unit does not have access to a washer and dryer, however, there are lots of options locally including a same day pick up and delivery service!--- THE OUTSIDE:Our property covers three city lots, an unusual amount of space for this part of town. The yard is expansive and in addition to ornamental and wild foliage, we have apple trees, raspberries and rhubarb plants which you are welcome to help yourself to in season. You won’t see the neighbors or the street as a hillside, trees, green belt and fencing all create incredible privacy. It really feels like out of city living while still being able to enjoy the benefits of having everything super close by. The Fish Creek Estuary runs right next to us and so does the Fish Creek Trail. Yes, we have a HOT TUB! It’s on a separate deck built into the hillside overlooking the yard which is adorned with dreamy string lights. The tub is shared with us in the upstairs unit and you are welcome to enjoy it! There will be detailed use instructions and rules listed inside the home. We all want to enjoy a clean and safe spa so use of the hot tub is contingent on your agreement to abide by our rules and instructions.

more description: Stay at this 3-bed, 1.5 bath duplex while in Anchorage! Located near Jewel Lake and Kincaid Park, this home tucked into a quiet neighborhood provides easy access to nature, southside shopping, as well as activities downtown!  A perfect place to recharge after long, exhilarating days exploring Anchorage and the surrounding mountains and natural beauty. ✓ Great for Family Retreats✓ Committed to Guest Safety✈ 10 min or less from ANC Airport✓ Wifi✓ TV✓ 3 Car Driveway✓ Fully Fenced BackyardThe spaceNearbyLess than 5 minutes to grocery store, restaurants, Jewel Lake & Sand Lake. Less than 10 minutes to Airport, Dimond Center mall, and Costco. 15 mins. to Downtown & UMED. JBER 20-30 mins. World famous natural beauty & parks in 20 minutes or less! EntranceCovered front porch and entrance into the through home. New carpet throughout the home. Kitchen & DiningFull size kitchen that includes a refrigerator with built-in ice maker, electric stove/oven range, coffee pot, dishwasher, microwave, garbage disposal, toaster, & knife block. Dining table seats 6 guests comfortably (extra folding chair and high chair available). Living RoomCozy couch and bench to enjoy some down time and watch TV with the family. Bedrooms & BathroomsThere are 3 bedrooms and 1.5 bathrooms throughout the home. On the lower floor you'll find all 3 bedrooms, each with closet space, and the main bath. The half bath is upstairs near the laundry room/kitchen.Bedroom #1- Queen BedBedroom #2- Bunk Bed - Twin over FullBedroom #3- Futon converts to comfortable full-size bed. Also available an additional twin-size foldout bed and a Pack-N-Play. Laundry RoomThe full-size washer and dryer are on the upper level near the kitchen. BackyardThe fully fenced in backyard is a good place to let your dog roam around comfortably, access is through the side yard around the home. Side yard with outdoor furniture (summers only) accessed via the front door.

description: Creek House #3️⃣FULL ALASKA EXPERIENCE~🛶~🐟~🍻
name: Apartment in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Amanda And Erik And Irena4 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in June 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Located in the heart of Anchorage our place is close to the airport, the city center, parks, and great views. Fish or float the creek which runs through our property! You’ll love our place because of the outdoors space, located on Campbell Creek with bike/running trail access. Experience the serenity of Alaska while being in the center of it all! If this unit is booked during your desired time, check out its sister unit The Creek House #4The spaceFrom the road our property is marked with a white address pole, the building is tucked away and it’s easy to miss the first time. When you pull in you will see the green building and 4 tan doors with several parking spaces in front of the doors. One parking spot is reserved and clearly marked for the permanent tenant. Once you get out of the vehicle you will walk through the gate to be greeted by the beautiful yard and garden space with the tranquil creek flowing through it. This creek can be fished, floated, swam in, or just enjoyed.  On the weekends, we usually see friendly folks floating the creek.  Additionally, we are directly on Anchorages famous Campbell Creek trail system that can take you anywhere in the city using paved walking and bike paths.  We are located directly in the middle of Anchorage, making it convenient to go anywhere from here, with activities in all directions.   Only about a 5 minutes cab ride from the airport, and 15 minutes to anywhere in town. You’ll enter the building through a coral entry door all four units share this common arctic entry. Each unit has its own private door to enter into it. All of our doors have coded locks so you never have to worry about keys. There will be six stairs to get to your apartment. Once you enter your apartment you will walk into the living room that’s decorated to be stylish and comfortable. In the kitchen you’ll find all the essentials to make and enjoy meal together. We supply coffee, creamer and sugar as well as most cooking spices. There are two bedrooms with queen beds and one bathroom. We supply all linens, pillows etc. You’ll need to bring your own charging cords. We supply towels, soap, shampoo and conditioner as well as a hair dryer. In the hall closet you’ll find fishing poles for use but you’ll need to provide your own bait and you can purchase a fishing license online at Alaska.gov. We also have a stock of board games for your enjoyment.We have a bbq and picnic area as well as several fire pit areas and s’more sticks. Please enjoy the space responsibly :) A few things to remember.  This is in a 4 unit apartment and people live in the above units, so you may hear walking and doors shutting. We provide you with fans in the unit to create white noise for light sleepers.  It is also next to a street that gives easy access to the rest of the city.  That means when you are outside, you will hear the sound of cars driving by, but that unfortunately cannot be avoided when staying in the city.  All the windows are new, which eliminates the loud noises when all the windows are closed. The airport is currently under runway renovations and one of the temporary flight paths is over our property do you may hear or see planes. Alaska has the largest small plane usage than any other state as it’s one of the best and sometimes only ways to get around up here, so anywhere you stay in Anchorage you will see and hear air traffic. Well behaved dogs are welcome, and there are dogs and a 'guard cat' on premises, all very friendly to people and other doggos. You are responsible for letting us know if you will be bringing a pet, cleaning up after your pet and for any damage your pet may cause. Having a pet at our property means you are assuming all liability for your pet while on the premises. We also charge a pet fee of $15/day. The unit is not "baby proofed" but meets all building and safety regulations and codes. We welcome families but want you to be aware that it’s not child proofed. Onsite laundry is coin operated.If this place is booked during your desired times, check out our other units, The Creek House #4 & The Creek House #1So bring you’re adventurous spirit, clothes, charging cords and toothbrush and prepare to have a great experience with us! We hope you’ll love Alaska as much as we do!

description: Cedar Alley, A Cozy Home near Downtown Anchorage
name: Home in South Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by Pam5 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in December 2015**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: An 800  square foot cottage in Anchorage's South Addition, just south of downtown.  Within walking distance of a bakery, grocery store, tennis courts, the Conoco/Phillips building, the 5th Avenue Mall,  the Anchorage Museum, the Dena'ina Center, the Egan Center, the Performing Arts Center, the Sullivan Arena, and many other attractions.  Near enough to walk to the start of the Iditarod sled dog race or the annual Fur Rendezvous Festival.  Come enjoy downtown Anchorage.The spaceA cozy little house, built just after WWII, this home is just right for a small family or group of friends who want to have the base of their Alaskan vacation near downtown Anchorage.  The home has a deck, complete with a gas grill for outdoor cooking and dining when weather permits.Cedar Alley has always worked to provide the cleanest vacation rental possible.  Our normal cleaning routine has included stripping the beds down to the bedbug-proof mattress cover and washing all of the items - mattress pad to blankets.  In addition, we have steam-cleaned the mattress covers, pillows, upholstered furniture, area rugs, etc.  Hard surfaces like counters, tile, flooring, cabinets, doorknobs, etc. have been cleaned with a solution of vinegar and water, and commercial cleaners.  During this time of increased concern about the possible transmission of viruses, we have added the use of bleach solution on these hard surfaces.

name: Home in Chugiak
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by Lynde16 guests ·  · 4 bedrooms ·  · 10 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 16 guests · **__** · 4 bedrooms · **__** · 10 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in October 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Close to town but removed enough to recharge & rest after a day of adventuring!This one has it all- SO cute! Accommodates larger groups and wonderful for families/kiddos. Open floor plan, peaceful and serene with mountain and inlet views, but also tucked in the trees on large, beautiful lot.The spaceFantastic location (conveniently located halfway between Anchorage and Mat-Su Valley). Only 15 minutes to downtown Anchorage and sitting on over an acre, this property backs to a state park where you can experience Alaska in it's true glory. Great hiking, even to Mt. Baldy if you choose all within steps of your front door. Just a three minute drive to grocery stores, restaurants and spa services in the sweet little town of Eagle River. plenty of parking. Quiet and peaceful. Kids will LOVE the swing set.Enjoy a glass of wine or dinner out on the deck or a soak in the oversized soaking tub after an exciting day of wild life viewing or hiking. Enjoy a game of volleyball or badminton out on the lawn, or sit around the fire pit as you visit with your friends and family. Moose and even bear sometimes pass through. There really is something for everyone! Winter guests can enjoy sleds to take to near by sledding hills for some family fun!Fire place is electric in living room.The common space acts as the 4th bedroom it has a queen bed that's  a shared space with the family room, yet private with curtain enclosure.

name: Apartment in Anchorage

more description: Welcome to Raspberry Suites, a beautiful 1 bedroom apartment with VIEWS of the Chugach Mountains. Thoughtfully decorated with "Alaskana" style and one of a kind Alaska Native art. This rustic retreat is right in the city and truly is the best of both worlds.5 minute drive to airport10 minute drive to downtown5 minute walk to DeLong Lake5 minute walk to restaurants, coffee shop, liquor store, BUS STOPClose to Kincaid ParkApartment is on the second floor and is a walk upNo Smokers AllowedThe spaceThis is a one bedroom, one bathroom top floor apartment with MOUNTAIN VIEWS from the apartment.  This apartment is on the second floor and is a walk up.KING size bedHUGE shared rooftop deck space with view of mountainsFull kitchenPrivate in unit free LAUNDRY. Covered parking space (no shoveling snow off your car)The building has 4 private apartments, each have their own covered parking space.  All of the apartments share a rooftop patio on top of the carport and share the backyard.  The carport patio has VIEWS of the Chugach Mountains!Trax Outdoor Center 2.0 has across the street has cross country ski rentals and lessons in the winter and they have paddle boards for rent in the summer.  Kincaid Park is right down the road and is a great place to cross country ski and see moose.  Delong lake is less than a 10 minute walk and is nice for summer swimming, paddle boarding, and winter ice fishing.

more description: Enjoy your time in downtown Anchorage at this newly remodeled 2 bedroom. Enjoy the comfort of this rental while experiencing the convenience of being walking distance to downtown, great restaurants, the museum, grocery store, & more! Outdoor patio, courtyard for lounging and yard games, & tons of space to cook or kick back & enjoy downtime! A great space for your family or the business professional looking for luxury & a great location! Beautiful neighborhood just a stroll from the lake.The spaceThis is the upstairs unit of a duplex on a beautiful downtown lot in an established neighborhood. This fully remodeled space is sure to satisfy both the traveling family and the business professional with its clean and luxurious space to get away and experience Anchorage while enjoying comfortable amenities to make your stay enjoyable. You will find a fully stocked kitchen, comfy beds, an outdoor deck, a backyard to be enjoyed, and more! This space is designed for comfort.Additional units on the property available for traveling groups or families! Downstairs and just on the other side of the backyard are two more units, each 2 bedrooms. Have your own space while being close enough for lots of time together!

description: Cupples Cottage #4: Downtown! Close to JBER!
name: Apartment in Downtown Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Rob2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in May 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to the award winning Cupples Cottages!  This 600sf flat was recently renovated and is beautifully furnished.When built in 1952 by my late grandfather these units were offered fully furnished providing temporary housing primarily to the construction workers living away from their families working on my grandfather's construction crew.  Fast forward over 65 years and 2 generations and the property has returned back to its roots as we welcome short term guests from all over the world!The spaceCupples Cottages offers warm, cozy accommodations at budget friendly prices.  Our goal is to offer something special, unique. The property consists of two duplexes and one single family home totaling four units.  Our cottages offer fully equipped kitchens, dining room, living room, bedroom and a single bath.  Each unit features an electric fireplace and a wifi enabled smart tv, ready for you to log into your favorite streaming service!We currently offer four 1 bedroom apartment style cottages and a 2 bedroom single family home.  When complete, the property will feature gated security access, onsite bike rentals (currently available!) and will boast over 10,000sf of outdoor lawn/garden green space. It promises to be a property unlike any other in downtown Anchorage.Find us on social media (you know where, the thumbs up place) by searching "Cupples Cottages" and like our page, this way you can watch our progress as we grow!IMPORTANT POLICIES:NO parties or group gatheringsNO petsNO smoking of any kind inside the cottagesExterior 24 hour video surveillance is utilized to help us ensure compliance of these policies.  Guests who violate the above policies will be subject to additional fee and cleaning charges.Recreational marijuana users:  While use of marijuana is legal in the state of Alaska, Cupples Cottages is a "marijuana free zone". If you intend to use marijuana during your trip to Alaska, we are not the right fit for you. Please find a different listing. Due to odor transfer from skin, hair and clothing which results in odors entering and permeating our cottages we request our guests remain "marijuana free" for the duration of their stay regardless of where you may choose to consume. (This policy is in place due to past experiences)

more description: Spacious, peaceful home in south Anchorage.  Here, you are surrounded by spruce and birch and can hear the waters of Rabbit creek rushing by. The property is tucked away from the noise and busyness of main streets. Yet, it is only a 1.4 mile drive to the highway entrance. Within minutes, you can be on your way to other gorgeous Alaskan day trip destinations. The large yard provides an open space for fun and games. Keep your eyes open, as wildlife is often spotted in the area.The spaceMain Level has the following:   Bedroom 1: Queen Bed   Bedroom 2: Queen Bed   Full bath2nd Level has the following:   Bedroom 3: King Bed   Bedroom 4: Twin Bed   Full bath   Kitchen (pots, pans, utensils, serving platters, coffee maker)   Living Room (Smart TV*, wireless internet access)   Dining Room (seating for 6-8)   Deck (grill for the summer only)*Access your favorite Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon shows using your login.If staying in the summer, each room has black-out shades to facilitate better sleep (although we still recommend a sleep mask as well).If staying in the winter and you anticipate snow during your stay, you can utilize the 2-car garage and avoid having to brush snow off your vehicle in the morning.Yard is not fenced.

description: Creek House #3️⃣FULL ALASKA EXPERIENCE~🛶~🐟~🍻
name: Apartment in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Amanda And Erik And Irena4 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in June 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Located in the heart of Anchorage our place is close to the airport, the city center, parks, and great views. Fish or float the creek which runs through our property! You’ll love our place because of the outdoors space, located on Campbell Creek with bike/running trail access. Experience the serenity of Alaska while being in the center of it all! If this unit is booked during your desired time, check out its sister unit The Creek House #4The spaceFrom the road our property is marked with a white address pole, the building is tucked away and it’s easy to miss the first time. When you pull in you will see the green building and 4 tan doors with several parking spaces in front of the doors. One parking spot is reserved and clearly marked for the permanent tenant. Once you get out of the vehicle you will walk through the gate to be greeted by the beautiful yard and garden space with the tranquil creek flowing through it. This creek can be fished, floated, swam in, or just enjoyed.  On the weekends, we usually see friendly folks floating the creek.  Additionally, we are directly on Anchorages famous Campbell Creek trail system that can take you anywhere in the city using paved walking and bike paths.  We are located directly in the middle of Anchorage, making it convenient to go anywhere from here, with activities in all directions.   Only about a 5 minutes cab ride from the airport, and 15 minutes to anywhere in town. You’ll enter the building through a coral entry door all four units share this common arctic entry. Each unit has its own private door to enter into it. All of our doors have coded locks so you never have to worry about keys. There will be six stairs to get to your apartment. Once you enter your apartment you will walk into the living room that’s decorated to be stylish and comfortable. In the kitchen you’ll find all the essentials to make and enjoy meal together. We supply coffee, creamer and sugar as well as most cooking spices. There are two bedrooms with queen beds and one bathroom. We supply all linens, pillows etc. You’ll need to bring your own charging cords. We supply towels, soap, shampoo and conditioner as well as a hair dryer. In the hall closet you’ll find fishing poles for use but you’ll need to provide your own bait and you can purchase a fishing license online at Alaska.gov. We also have a stock of board games for your enjoyment.We have a bbq and picnic area as well as several fire pit areas and s’more sticks. Please enjoy the space responsibly :) A few things to remember.  This is in a 4 unit apartment and people live in the above units, so you may hear walking and doors shutting. We provide you with fans in the unit to create white noise for light sleepers.  It is also next to a street that gives easy access to the rest of the city.  That means when you are outside, you will hear the sound of cars driving by, but that unfortunately cannot be avoided when staying in the city.  All the windows are new, which eliminates the loud noises when all the windows are closed. The airport is currently under runway renovations and one of the temporary flight paths is over our property do you may hear or see planes. Alaska has the largest small plane usage than any other state as it’s one of the best and sometimes only ways to get around up here, so anywhere you stay in Anchorage you will see and hear air traffic. Well behaved dogs are welcome, and there are dogs and a 'guard cat' on premises, all very friendly to people and other doggos. You are responsible for letting us know if you will be bringing a pet, cleaning up after your pet and for any damage your pet may cause. Having a pet at our property means you are assuming all liability for your pet while on the premises. We also charge a pet fee of $15/day. The unit is not "baby proofed" but meets all building and safety regulations and codes. We welcome families but want you to be aware that it’s not child proofed. Onsite laundry is coin operated.If this place is booked during your desired times, check out our other units, The Creek House #4 & The Creek House #1So bring you’re adventurous spirit, clothes, charging cords and toothbrush and prepare to have a great experience with us! We hope you’ll love Alaska as much as we do!

description: Cozy Peaceful Private Luxury w/Hot tub Views!
name: Home in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by Tyler8 guests ·  · 4 bedrooms ·  · 5 beds ·  · 2.5 baths
number of guests: 8 guests · **__** · 4 bedrooms · **__** · 5 beds · **__** · 2.5 baths**__**Joined in April 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to "Shiloh and Harmony" in this peaceful modern home on 1.3 acres along thousands of acres of unobstructed views of Eagle River!  Feast your eyes on Chugach Mountain views. Soak in the panorama, aurora,  meteor showers, and wildlife viewing from the private deck and hot tub. Afterward, cozy up in a blanket by the fireplace!  Secluded yet easy to get around!2 min: North Fork trailhead7 min: Walmart Supercenter and grocery8 min: Eagle River Nature Center25 min: downtown AnchorageThe spaceThis spacious retreat is private, warm, welcoming and includes everything you need to feel at home and build memories!Primary bedroom:  After your Alaskan Adventures, come rest on a King size mattress supported by a solid wood Amish bed next to a modern fireplace!  Not ready to sleep?....indulge in comfort on our Stressless leather seat enjoying sunrise over the snowcapped mountains! Bedrooms 2 & 3:  Snooze on a queen-size mattress. One room has a highly-rated memory foam mattress and the other is firm yet very comfortable. You decide! Both will provide a pleasant restful sleep.Bedroom 4:  Two twin-size beds offer memorable conversations before bedtime.  Our two kids love talking about the fun-filled day before lights out.Each bedroom comes equipped with extra blankets, pillows, and a luggage rack.  Living room:  Enjoy our beautiful Italian-made top-grain Natuzzi leather sofa facing the majestic mountain views! Time for a movie? The flatscreen HD tv is equipped with Ruku TV where you can log into your own selected streaming service and watch your favorite shows and movies.  Dining Room:  Nothing like the smell of a home-cooked meal!  Enjoy it on a single slab wood dining table perfect for 8 people to enjoy yummy food and family time. Counter seating is available for those quick meals before leaving for a hike, bike ride, snowboarding, ski adventure, or whatever you have planned for the day. Kitchen:  Equipped with a commercial 6 burner gas stove and oven,  convection/microwave, ice maker, toaster, rice maker, dishwasher, and refrigerator/freezer. Bonus! Hot water tap for on-demand hot chocolate!  Reminder:  No food down the drain as we have a private septic system. There is no garbage disposal.Private Deck and Hot tub:  On a clear night you may get amazing celestial views! : Auroras (northern lights), meteor showers, eclipses, or star gaze into the milky way!  The back deck is also an amazing wildlife viewing platform.  On a sunny day, it's our favorite place to be! Take a break in our brand-new hot tub to enjoy the views while soaking and having back and foot massaging jets go to work!  Laundry Room:  Feel free to use our full-size washer and dryer. Garage: Feel free to park up to two vehicles in the garage, however, we do store some personal items in the garage. There are unlocked tools and chemicals. Children may not be left unattended in the garage.Basement: The basement is locked and currently used for personal storage.

more description: Your vacation home is set in West Anchorage, just 5 minutes from the airport and 5 minutes from downtown Anchorage! You will have direct access to the bike trail system right outside the private back yard and be about 100 feet from a great cup of coffee or meal. This is the perfect place for you to experience West Anchorage and all it has to offer, as well as being a convenient home base on your tour of the great state of Alaska.The spaceBoth Cortney and myself have put plenty of effort and love into this space to make it as comfy and homey as possible for you.  There are two brand new queen beds upstairs, as well as a full size, memory foam, pullout couch downstairs for our guests. We have a Nespresso coffee maker, a fully stocked kitchen and a grill for you to enjoy the outdoors while you cook.  Cortney and I love to go fishing, so if you see us, make sure to ask us for a fresh fillet of salmon or halibut.

number of guests: 10 guests · **__** · 4 bedrooms · **__** · 5 beds · **__** · 3 baths**__**Joined in May 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to the hillside home of your dreams! This space is a perfect getaway with family or friends and is only minutes from the fantastic attractions in Anchorage.Our light, bright modern home is nestled in the south Anchorage hillside woods. Featuring 4 bedrooms and 3 baths, this space is not only breathtaking, but its location is truly unbeatable.During your stay, you'll be:3 mins from the Seward Highway14 mins from downtown Anchorage14 mins to Ted Stevens Intl AirportWelcome Home!The spaceYou'll Have:✓ Fresh roasted coffee, decaf, and tea assortment✓ Delicious snacks for those late night arrivals✓ Super fast WiFi✓ Free parking✓ Full kitchen✓ Areas to work from home, including sit/stand desks with great audio and an external monitor to connect to your device✓ Extremely comfortable beds and pillows✓ Quality toiletries and soaps✓ Large Sony and Samsung Smart TVs with Klipsch Sound✓ Hulu, Netflix, Disney+, and MORE✓ Washer and Dryer with detergent, oxi-clean, and dryer sheets✓ Board Game collection✓ Rice cooker, instant pot, waffle maker, and drip coffee makerThis home does not skimp on CHARM. From the moment you walk into our thoughtfully decorated Alaskan villa, we want you to feel at home! The home is equipped with one king bed (master bedroom), two queen beds (each in their own separate bedroom), and two twin beds (both placed in one bedroom). Additionally, we've provided an extra sleeping option (for a total of 6 beds in the home) with a foldable roll-away twin bed (and memory foam mattress) - we'll let your group play ‘rock, paper, scissors’ for who sleeps where! If you want to "work from home," we've provided many ways to make your work pass by quickly! The home features the latest internet technology with a 2-gigabit internet connection, coupled with a super fast WiFi 6E Router. This means that you will be able to experience WiFi Speeds of up to 1.8gbps down, and 50mbps up. Or, if you're lucky and are truly on vacation, you can  completely disconnect by relaxing with a cup of coffee, cocktail, or a bowl of popcorn while enjoying the great Alaskan outdoors outside on the home's spacious deck. Sure, eating at any one of Anchorage’s renown restaurants is fun. But sometimes we all need a nice home-cooked meal, right? That's why our kitchen is fully stocked with all the essentials to help you cook your crew a delicious Alaskan dinner! Netflix and chill, anyone? Although we don't offer cable, each TV features smart TV options. We provide complimentary access to Netflix, Hulu, Disney+, and ESPN+. You are welcome to login to any other service that you personally pay for. While the home is equipped to host 10 people, we think the perfect group size is 7-8. We're happy to host all 10, but keep in mind it is a little cozier as it's a 2100 square foot home. We take the sanitation and cleaning procedures of our home very seriously. All of the bedding and linens are laundered between each new stay, and all commonly touched surfaces and objects are sanitized during each cleaning.

description: Cozy Alaskan Cottage / Midtown Anchorage
name: Cottage in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire cottage hosted by Brian3 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 3 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in August 2019**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Experience the warmth and charm of Alaska in the heart of the city. Your private cottage oasis in the center of the unique Spenard District gives you access to the best Anchorage has to offer. Only 10 minutes from the airport, spend less time commuting and more time enjoying Alaska. After a day on the nearby trails, parks or adventures, unwind around a cozy fire. Your private retreat includes all the creature comforts you need; WIFI, Smart TV, desk/workspace, and fully equipped kitchen.The spaceAn updated cottage with a strong focus on environmental sustainability. We provide guests with only environmentally friendly, non-toxic and biodegradable bath products during your stay.  We also use non-toxic, and biodegradable cleaning products and laundry detergent.  Enjoy the great green space both indoors and out. The cottage has 1 bedroom with a Queen bed and an additional pullout sleeper sofa in the spacious living room area (great for kids or an additional guest).  Additionally, there is a Foldable Pack ‘n Play provided (please bring your own sheets) – Located in the bedroom closet for guests use, if needed. The bathroom is equipped with a full size bath tub, detachable shower head, commode, sink, and vaulted ceiling that compliments a bubble bath or quick rinse before jetting off to the next adventure.-Kitchen includes: Full Kitchen, dishwasher, PUR filtered water dispenser, dishes, silverware, pots/pan, utensil, coffee, tea, honey, half/half creamer, pancake mix (just add water) with organic maple syrup.Other Amenities Include: extra towels, extra sheets, in-floor radiant heat, hair dryer, iron, large closet space, dresser, Smart TV with ability to Cast or Airplay from mobile device, wood stove fireplace – split wood provided, space heater for added comfort, fan, private entrance with self-check-in lock box for key access, WiFi, desk/workspace, washer/dryer, driveway for off street parking, and some electrical outlets have been updated to Surge Protector with USB Charging.Thermostat is set at 70°F during the day (7AM -> 11:30PM) and 68°F during the night (11:30PM -> 7AM).  The house has radiant heated floors and the temperature needs to stay constant due to the response time. You’re more than welcome to adjust the thermostat. The temperature change will hold until the next schedule change.  See schedule times listed above.  If you need a specific temperature, please let me know and I can adjust prior to your arrival.  Space heater and fan are provided for extra comfort.

more description: Experience Alaska living in a well maintained 2 bedroom log cabin, with beautiful views of our mountains, including Denali, Foraker, & Hunter, & sunset views across the inlet. Visitors to this property often comment about the spectacular view from this hillside perch. Guests have the entire unit to themselves, no shared space. The home provides a clean environment with modern amenities, and is located midway between Anchorage & the Matsu Valley. Enjoy your stay & be sure to bring your camera!The spaceThe guesthouse has 2 full bedrooms, a master bedroom with queen size bed and a private full bathroom with shower. The second bedroom has a twin size top bunk and full size bottom bunk, and there is a shared bath in the hallway. The full kitchen is well stocked with cookware, mugs & glasses, utensils, dishes, and silverware. There is a spacious living room, and dining room with a view!

description: Bold Peak Cabin ~ Eklutna Lake State Park
name: Cabin in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire cabin hosted by Linda6 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · Half-bath
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · Half-bath**__**Joined in May 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Get away from it all! The cabin is just 45 minute drive from Anchorage and less than 2 miles from Eklutna Lake State Park.  Bold Peak Cabin offers amazing views, total privacy and access to hiking, biking, kayaking, paddle boarding, skiing, and so much more. Simple but luxurious log cabin designed for those who want the camping experience without "roughing" it.If looking for Northern Lights try the "My Aurora Forecast" app.All-wheel or 4 wheel drive is a MUST during snowy season!!!The spaceBold Peak cabin is designed to give you the experience of camping without losing modern conveniences. There are large windows on the front of the cabin offering a 180° view of the surrounding mountains so you can enjoy a cup of coffee while looking out at Bold Peak. This is a true, Alaska DRY cabin (NO PLUMBING, NO SHOWER) experience (there are shower and laundry facilities at Vitus in Chugiak, during the winter and Twin Peak Treats, around the corner, during the summer). There is a wood stove in the living room and a Toyo Oil Stove; a composting toilet in a private bathroom; and basic cooking appliances including a 2-burner electric hot plate, toaster, microwave and Keurig (pods provided) and drip coffee maker. Master bedroom has a queen bed, second bedroom has queen size bunk beds that sleep 4.  Sheets are provided, but guests will have to "make up and strip" the top bunk.Please note: there ISN'T a railing on the deck stairs, deck or top bunk. Use precaution!

description: The Johnson House Cottage
name: Cottage in Palmer
unit rental details: Entire cottage hosted by Mark & Marilyn4 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in March 2015**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: The cottage is a secluded guesthouse in a friendly neighborhood with spectacular views of the Knik Glacier and river.  This retreat has room for up to four guests. It is an open floor plan with a double bed on the ground floor and twin beds in an upstairs loft.  The kitchen has an induction cooktop, refrigerator, coffee pot, microwave. Propane BBQ on the deck and bathroom with a shower.   Our cottage is not visible from the parking area so self check-in is not an option.The spaceThe cottage is an hour drive from Anchorage and 20 minutes from Palmer. Hiking and wildlife viewing are some of the many activities enjoyed by our guests and the view of Knik Glacier is spectacular.  Our location is a great halfway point between Denali Park and the Kenai Peninsula. We are off grid with no wifi to distract you from your complete getaway. The deck is great for moose viewing!  Guests must maintain a safe distance from our wildlife.

more description: Long Term Guests Welcome! The Cottage GuestHouse is a fully furnished one bedroom, side by side duplex. The guesthouse has a private entrance, fenced yard, wireless internet, Smart TV with Roku, stocked kitchen, full bath, washer/dryer and parking next to the unit.   Conveniently located in the Fairview District, just between downtown and midtown, the view to the east is the vast Chugach Mountain Range, and to the west, one mile to downtown Anchorage and Cook Inlet.The spaceThis is a quiet neighborhood, but in the City. About a mile from downtown, and five miles to the airport. There is private parking for your vehicle right next to the unit. The yard has a BBQ and outdoor seating. There are two other guesthouses on the property which also may be rented. This is a DOG FRIENDLY property! If you are allergic to dogs, do not rent. Please let me know what dog(s) you are bringing and you must agree to the pet addendum.

description: Cupples Cottage #1: Downtown! Close to JBER!
name: Apartment in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Rob2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in May 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to the award winning Cupples Cottages!  This 600sf flat was recently renovated and is beautifully furnished.When built in 1952 by my late grandfather these units were offered fully furnished providing temporary housing primarily to the construction workers living away from their families working on my grandfather's construction crew.  Fast forward over 65 years and 2 generations and the property has returned back to its roots as we welcome short term guests from all over the world!The spaceCupples Cottages offers warm, cozy accommodations at budget friendly prices.  Our goal is to offer something special, unique. The property consists of two duplexes and one single family home totaling four units.  Our cottages offer fully equipped kitchens, dining room, living room, bedroom and a single bath.  Each unit features an electric fireplace and a wifi enabled smart tv, ready for you to log into your favorite streaming service!We currently offer four 1 bedroom apartment style cottages and a 2 bedroom single family home.  When complete, the property will feature gated security access, onsite bike rentals (currently available!) and will boast over 10,000sf of outdoor lawn/garden green space. It promises to be a property unlike any other in downtown Anchorage.Find us on social media (you know where, the thumbs up place) by searching "Cupples Cottages" and like our page, this way you can watch our progress as we grow!IMPORTANT POLICIES:NO parties or group gatheringsNO petsNO smoking of any kind inside the cottagesExterior 24 hour video surveillance is utilized to help us ensure compliance of these policies.  Guests who violate the above policies will be subject to additional fee and cleaning charges.Recreational marijuana users:  While use of marijuana is legal in the state of Alaska, Cupples Cottages is a "marijuana free zone". If you intend to use marijuana during your trip to Alaska, we are not the right fit for you. Please find a different listing. Due to odor transfer from skin, hair and clothing which results in odors entering and permeating our cottages we request our guests remain "marijuana free" for the duration of their stay regardless of where you may choose to consume. (This policy is in place due to past experiences)

description: The Bel-Hygge 🐋 Chalet Coziness/Comfort the AK way
name: Chalet in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire chalet hosted by Scotti5 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 1.5 baths
number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 1.5 baths**__**Joined in April 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: The vibe of our chalet is centered around the Danish practice Hygge (hue-guh). We strive to cultivate a home away from home that makes you feel welcome, in the moment, relaxed & cozy. Just 15 minutes to downtown Anchorage & airport.The spaceBel-Hygge Chalet is ideally situated for the traveler who wants to take advantage of all there is to experience in the area. After a full day of exploring, the space is perfect for curling up with a book and a blanket in the basket chair by the window or settling into one of the comfy robes available after a nice steam in the sauna before enjoying a restful night on the super comfortable mattresses.  Your space features a large kitchen stocked with essentials, living/dining area w/ vaulted ceilings. Peek-a-boo views of Cook Inlet, mountains & sounds of the gentle flow of adjacent Rabbit Creek. Master br has a top of the line plush queen bed & it’s own bathroom. 2nd br has 2 comfy full beds. There is also a fun whale tent bed topper option for kids (by advanced request only). Enjoy a moment to reflect and just breathe in our large cedar sauna.TONS of great activities and games in the Chalet for all ages! Also have “Hygge stations” peppered throughout teaching about the Hygge way of life. Our policy is to put out freshly laundered sheets and pillowcases on the beds as well as clean fluffy towels for each new booking. Everything is professionally cleaned prior to each guest’s arrival, everything!We offer an included assortment of DIY breakfast type items. I'm a licensed minister and can perform your wedding or commitment ceremony and also offer special honeymoon/anniversary suite options for special occasions! (Just ask!)We pride ourselves in making sure your experience is top notch and are close by to meet any needs that may arise.- Check-in begins at 3 pm. Check-out is 12 pm. Please note that arriving early or departing late will result in additional charges. - No smoking (outside only). - Dogs permitted with $100 fee. (Dogs only; maximum 2 allowed. Dogs need to be crated if left at the property alone.) Please note that you are bringing a pet during booking process for fee to be applied. - No events, parties or large gatherings. - Must be at least 18 years old to book. - Please Note: a car is required, 4WD recommended in winter. Limited parking; vehicles limited to 2. - Photo ID may be required upon check-in.
