description: ✶Lavish 5✰ modern villa BEST location in DOWNTOWN✶
name: Home in Anchorage
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by Ryan9 guests ·  · 3 bedrooms ·  · 6 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 9 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 6 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in August 2015**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Discover the natural wonders and metropolitan luxuries of Anchorage from the newly remodeled Coastal Place! The large house is attached to Coastal Cabin, a historical downtown 1915 log cabin that is also listed on airbnb.  Coastal Place offers sleeping for 9 in an airy and spacious luxurious home with lots of extras. Being the closest bnb property to downtown, the coastal trail and the famous park strip, it is the ideal place to explore Anchorage and many adventures found in SouthCentral Alaska!The spaceWelcome to Coastal Place!Step into this exquisite custom home where natural light pouring in from surrounding windows illuminates an open living area. The 30 foot ceilings in the main area create an airy environment that resounds through the entire house. Walking into the fully equipped kitchen, you'll find stainless steel appliances, modern stove and oven, as well as bright stone countertops boasting generous space for preparing meals. Walk a few blocks and pick up some fresh Alaskan salmon and crab from 10th and M seafoods and dine in at your lovely 6 foot marble dining table. Enjoy complimentary pancakes, glacier waters, and coffee. New luxurious furnishings, a wall mounted flat-screen pivoting TV, and a gas fireplace in the living room create the perfect setting to unwind. Kick back and relax with some Netflix or HBO or your other steaming platform of choice as the fire warms you. There is a game closet full of board games. When you are ready to retire, step into one of the bedrooms and sink into the new, soft and luxurious beds. The master bedroom upstairs boasts high vaulted ceilings, a luxurious king sized bed with relaxing decor and seating for two. Raise the room-darkening shades and enjoy the mountain views from your bedroom before sinking into luxurious cotton sheets. The master bedroom also enjoys a spacious private bathroom and massive walk in closet where you will find a portable baby crib and plenty of extra blankets, linens and towels. The guest bedroom downstairs offers a comfortable pillow-top queen sized mattress in a Pottery Barn sleigh frame. In the closets you will find luggage racks and generous storage space.Entering the large upstairs loft you will find a full/twin bunk bed, and a sleeper sofa that provides two twin beds. Two inflatable mattresses (double and queen) are also available. There is room for 2-3 vehicles in the driveway and 1 vehicle in the garage. **THE LOCATION **If you are looking for the premier vacation rental home in Anchorage, you have come to the right place. This homes beauty, amenities and location are simply un-rivaled by any competitors. Accessing the coast, parks, museums, and restaurants could not be easier!Stroll down the coastal trail at Elderberry Park to experience stunning views of the majestic Alaska Range sitting across Cook Inlet, or spend time exploring the performing arts center, parks, Anchorage museum, craft shops, and restaurants of downtown.For a quick bite, visit local favorites: 49th State Brewing, Glacier Brewhouse, or Humpy's Great Alaskan Alehouse. Treat yourself to a top-quality seafood meal from Simon & Seaforts Saloon & Grill or Benihana, just a few hundred feet from your front door.Outdoor enthusiasts will love being close to some of the best hiking and sightseeing in the country! The iconic Alaska Railroad is a great way to see many of the state's scenic marvels, offering day trips and excursions to cultural destinations, coastal mountain hikes, and glacier cruises.With an abundance of outdoor touring companies, you'll surely never run out of things to do. Choose from several activities, including wildlife cruises, glacier climbing, iceberg kayaking, dog sledding, helicopter tours, and so much more!-- ADDITIONAL DETAILS --Key Residence Features:- Amenities include a fully equipped kitchen, free WiFi, flat-screen TV with, Netflix, Hulu, and HBO installed, fireplace, central heating, washer, dryer, a fenced-in yard, board games, baby crib, breakfast and much more.- Truly Unbeatable location - Minutes from the coast, downtown Anchorage, and plentiful outdoor excursions!- Nearest Commercial Airport: Ted Stevens Anchorage International Airport - 5000 W International Airport Rd, Anchorage, AK 99502, (~ 6.8 miles away)-- POLICIES --- No smoking- Pets considered. Please contact me to discuss. - Events and gatherings considered.- Additional fees and taxes may apply
